patches.name: Unofficial Skyrim Special Edition Patch
patches.desc: Fixes hundreds of gameplay, quest, NPC, object, item, text, and placement bugs.

patches.name: Fuz Ro D-oh - Silent Voice
patches.desc: Enhances support for unvoiced in-game dialog by playing a generic silent voice and lip synch file whenever a dialog response doesn't include voice.

patches.name: Thieves Guild Requirements SE
patches.desc: Brynjolf will not approach you and the Thieves Guild quest will not activate if you're not a thief - must have stolen items, picked pockets, and have some skill in sneak.

patches.name: The Paarthurnax Dilemma
patches.desc: Without giving anything away, this basically gives you a very important choice where before you had none. You want this mod.

patches.name: Sell Unusual Gems - Stones of Barenziah
patches.desc: Lets you sell unusual gems to a Khajiit trader (removes "No Stone Unturned" quest from journal)

patches.name: Accurate and Realistic Fast Travel Time
patches.desc: Fast traveling to a nearby location takes the equivalent time of running (instead of 1-2 hours).

patches.name: Acquisitive Soul Gems Multithreaded
patches.desc: Prevents unfilling a soul gem with a weaker soul.

patches.name: Weapons Armor Clothing and Clutter Fixes
patches.desc: Fixes bugs and inconsistencies for Skyrim's weapons, armors, clothing, jewelry, and clutter items.

patches.name: LeanWolf's Better-Shaped Weapons SE
patches.desc: Fixes meshes for Vanilla weapons so they look less like weapons from WoW and more like actual swords. Compatible with [Immersive Weapons](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27644/) and any texture mods.

patches.name: Static Mesh Improvement Mod - SMIM
patches.desc: A massive project to greatly improve the appearance of countless static 3D models in Skyrim.

patches.name: SMIM Windmills Resized
patches.desc: Makes the blades of the windmills larger/more realistic in size. Requires [SMIM](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/659) for textures.

patches.name: Blacksmith Forge Water Fix - Special Edition
patches.desc: Replaces the fake static water at the blacksmith forges with real water.

patches.name: Ethereal Elven Overhaul patches for SSE
patches.desc: Fixes the facial structure of all elves in game - makes them look more like elves instead of goblins. Requires manually patching the original Skyrim mod.

patches.name: Height Adjusted Races with True Giants SSE port
patches.desc: Changes the height of all races and some creatures (with gender differences).

patches.name: Skyrim Sizes
patches.desc: Realistically increases differences in height between genders and races for Player and NPCs.

ui.name: SkyUI
ui.desc: An essential interface mod that displays the inventory, magic and other menus in a detailed table format, and provides the Mod Configuration Menu used by most other mods.

ui.name: Immersive HUD - iHUD Special Edition
ui.desc: Hides pieces of the interface until needed to increase immersion. Highly configrable - control what is hidden or visible, when they appear, and how transparent.

ui.name: A Matter of Time - A HUD clock widget
ui.desc: Displays current game time in HUD. Choose style, location, transparency, etc. Highly configurable. Requires [SkyUI](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/12604)

ui.name: Auto-save and time SSE
ui.desc: Displays a ton of information with one small, unobtrusive widget - current game time, current real-life time, hunger, thirst, sleep, etc. Adds real-world alarm clock, immersive game time notifications, immersive wait, dynamic timescale that varies by situation (configurable).

ui.name: Extended UI (WIP)
ui.desc: Greatly improves the skills menu. Can also extend sleep/wait time up to 30 days. Port in progress.

ui.name: MoreHUD SE
ui.desc: Shows useful information when hovering over lootable objects, such as carry weight, is it better than equipped gear, known ingredient effects, enchantments, and more. (Seperate version for Skyrim VR [moreHUD VR](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/33215)).

ui.name: Take Notes - Journal of the Dragonborn SSE
ui.desc: Adds a new player journal to the game which lets you create, view and export your own journal entries.

ui.name: iActivate - SE
ui.desc: Hides keypress hint and (optionally) the action text when viewing an interactive item.

ui.name: Less Intrusive HUD II SE
ui.desc: Lets you move, rotate, resize, hide and/or adjust the transparency of every interface element.

ui.name: No Boring Sleep-Wait Menu
ui.desc: Rest/wait without interruptions for up to 31 days.

ui.name: Updated Categorized Favorites Menu
ui.desc: An alternative to the SkyUI favorites menu that uses the entire screen to show all of your favorited items by category.

name: Yet Another Sorting Mod - Armor and Weapons
Yet Another Sorting Mod - Potions
Yet Another Sorting Mod - Misc Items
ui.desc: Renames items so they sort properly. Comes in three modules.

ui.name: Better Dialogue Controls
ui.desc: Fixes keyboard controls for dialog menus - Prevents selecting wrong item with "E" key because mouse pointer took focus away from the keyboard-selected item. When scrolling choices with mouse wheel, the center item is always the active one.

ui.name: Better MessageBox Controls
ui.desc: Lets you navigate and select popup message boxes with the keyboard. Also makes dialog options easier to select with the mouse by making clickable areas larger.

ui.name: Jaxonz Utilities (WIP)
ui.desc: A suite of convenient and useful utilities - reposition any static game object, rename anyone or anything, name your save games, mark any person, place or thing and see it on the map, auto looting, and more. Port in progress.

ui.name: Immersive First Person View
ui.desc: Enables a true first person perspective when riding a horse, in werewolf form, fighting, etc. Highly configurable.

ui.name: Joy of Perspective
ui.desc: Makes the character visible in 1st person view.

ui.name: To Your Face SE and VR
ui.desc: Restricts NPC greetings to those you look at, instead of any NPC within a set distance.

ui.name: Customizable Camera
ui.desc: Lets you modify the camera in almost any way you want via MCM i.e. center camera, don't change zoom when drawing weapon, etc.

ui.name: SkyVoice SSE - Become the Dragonborn
ui.desc: Use your voice (microphone) to execute dragon shouts.

ui.name: Shouts in the Dragon Tongue - Special Edition
ui.desc: View shouts in the Dragon Language with or without English translation. Several display options and combinations available.

ui.name: Unique Region Names SE
ui.desc: Displays name of the nine holds instead of "Skyrim".

ui.name: Even Better Quest Objectives SE - EBQO SE
ui.desc: Enhances the quest descriptions in the vanilla game so that you have a clear sense of where you are supposed to go and what you are supposed to do.

ui.name: The Choice is Yours
ui.desc: Quests are no longer added automatically when talking to an NPC. Quest are only added if you agree to help them.

ui.name: Timing is Everything SE
ui.desc: Lets you delay when you want various quest lines to trigger. Helps to prevent so many DLC quest lines from being activated at the start of a new game.

ui.name: YOT - Your Own Thoughts SE
ui.desc: Changes messages to a first-person point of view.

ui.name: Khajiit Speak - Complete Dialogue Overhaul (Special Edition)
ui.desc: For people playing as a Khajiit, it makes player dialogue sound more like a Khajiit.

ui.name: No psychic knowledge
ui.desc: Removes the visual tag on locks that indicate whether the lock is apprentice, adept, master, etc.

ui.name: Lore-Based Loading Screens
ui.desc: Adds 160 lore-based quotes as loading screens.

ui_map.name: Paper World Map for SSE
ui_map.desc: Replaces the standard map with a detailed paper map. Includes custom map markers.

ui_map.name: A Quality World Map
ui_map.desc: Adds roads to map and improves map quality. Comes with various options.

ui_map.name: Flat World Map Framework SE
ui_map.desc: Replaces Skyrim's default map with a 2D flat one. Includes heavy customization. Supports additional addon maps.

ui_map.name: Equip-able Maps SE
ui_map.desc: For hardcore immersion players. Allows you to craft maps you can view in your hand. Highly recommends a 2D map replacement.

ui_map.name: Pastel Map Markers
ui_map.desc: Replaces map markers with colored ones. The author acknoledges that these aren't really pastel.

ui_map.name: Natural Colored Map Markers 4K VR and SSE
ui_map.desc: Rustic colored map markers that will blend naturally with Skyrim's existing landscape and work well across all weather conditions. Designed to be legible in VR.

ui_map.name: Colour Map Markers SE
ui_map.desc: A simple recolor of map & HUD markers, with two versions.

ui_map.name: Flat Map Markers SSE
ui_map.desc: Moves all map markers onto the same plane on the world map. Designed to be used with paper maps.

ui_map.name: Remove Map Camera Limits - Skyrim and Solstheim
ui_map.desc: Makes it possible to almost zoom into the ground and removes border limits when panning.

ui_map.name: Follower Map Markers SSE
ui_map.desc: Adds map markers to any follower that you wish. The markers act just like quest markers.

ui_map.name: CS Tag N Track SE
ui_map.desc: Tag up to 40 NPCs and track their location through the Quest menu.

ui_map.name: Smaller Map Markers for SkyUI 5.2
ui_map.desc: Makes map markers smaller. Immersive full screen. Compatible with all map mods.

ui_map.name: Dungeon Quest Awareness Redux Special Edition
ui_map.desc: Changes the map markers and area location of dungeons that contain major quest so you don't start them too early.

ui_map.name: World Map (PNG)
ui_map.desc: A world map in PNG format by GameBanshee.com

ui_map.name: Atlas Map Markers SE
ui_map.desc: Adds over 700 map markers (including markers for Dawnguard & Dragonborn) to help find treasure maps, shrines, dragon mounds, campsites, skill books and more. Locations can be displayed as Default, Undiscovered, Discovered or they can be Removed.

ui_map.name: Mapseller SE
ui_map.desc: Adds a cartographer selling maps of the territories showing nearly every map marker in that territory.

ui_map.name: Legendary Player Home Map Markers SSE
ui_map.desc: Adds map markers to the front door of the 7 player houses, and 3 hearthfire houses.

ui_map.name: Mines of Skyrim SSE
ui_map.desc: Adds a book to leveled lists that contains the locations of all mines and their ore.

ui_map.name: Detailed Mine Markers
ui_map.desc: Adds and labels all Mine Map Markers to display the main material it yields.

ui_timesavers.name: AH Hotkeys - Skyrim Hotkey Manager SSE
ui_timesavers.desc: A more current and less-complicated hotkey manager than More Hotkeys Please.

ui_timesavers.name: Hotkey your Gear
ui_timesavers.desc: Lets you easily save weapon & armor sets for both you and your companions and then easily switch between them.

ui_timesavers.name: Swift Services
ui_timesavers.desc: Skips the NPC voice lines when you ask them to do something.

ui_timesavers.name: Unequip Quiver SE
ui_timesavers.desc: Automatically unequips quivers/bolts when not using a bow/crossbow.

ui_timesavers.name: Auto Hide Ammo
ui_timesavers.desc: Hides the ammo on your back when you aren't using a bow/crossbow.

ui_timesavers.name: Functional Homes SE
ui_timesavers.desc: Adds all crafting stations inside player homes + 40 linked storage containers (i.e. access same inventory from any home). Auto store and auto sort your crafting supplies by pushing one button.

ui_timesavers.name: Automatic Item Storage
ui_timesavers.desc: Adds 2 new storage cupboards to each buyable home that automatically store your items for you. Adds 1 knapsack that stores your soul gems next to each enchanting table.

ui_timesavers.name: Swift Potion Reborn
ui_timesavers.desc: Drink potions automatically depending on configurable settings (i.e. at 30% health). Adds a potion delay (configurable) to prevent spamming and adds potion hotkeys.

ui_timesavers.name: Kace Auto-Loot Reborn
ui_timesavers.desc: Take loot from dead enemies automatically. Highly configurable. SKSE required for MCM.

ui_information.name: BorderSense SE
ui_information.desc: Your character will note when crossing the border into a new hold and (optional) remark if you have a bounty in that hold.

ui_information.name: Hold Border Banners
ui_information.desc: Adds banners along roadsides at the boundaries of two holds.

ui_information.name: Improved Container Names
ui_information.desc: Makes container names more informative - "sack" becomes "sack of produce".

ui_information.name: Better Skill and Quest Books Names SE
ui_information.desc: Renames books to show the skills associated with them at the beginning of the name.

ui_information.name: Unread Books Glow SSE
ui_information.desc: Unread books will glow - Adjustable brightness (bright, medium, dim)

ui_information.name: Dragon Language Book (WIP)
ui_information.desc: Adds a book at High Hrothgar explaining the Dragon language. Over 20 pages of instruction and reference.

ui_information.name: Point The Way
ui_information.desc: Places additional road signs at several major intersections to make destination options more clear.

ui_information.name: Real Days and Months (WIP)
ui_information.desc: Uses actual day, month and times to sleep/wait menu e.g. Time Wait screen will say "Monday, 8:00 AM, 17th of August".

ui_information.name: Blitz Console Commands MCM - SSE
ui_information.desc: Adds an option under Help called "Console Commands" to the in-game pause menu. Lets you browse the list of all console command and their descriptions in-game.

ui_information.name: Console Books (Skyrim Special Edition)
ui_information.desc: Adds about 45 books to the game that include all the items ID for all the items in the game.

ui_information.name: Skyrim Performance Monitor 64
ui_information.desc: Displays Memory Usage and FPS (Frames per Second) information on the top right corner of your screen. Lets you view a graph of performance metrics from game session.

ui_information.name: STATUS
ui_information.desc: Displays a variety of game detail information in SkyUI i.e. coordinates, Health, Magicka & Stamina regen rates, speed and damage multipliers, etc.

ui_sounds.name: Sounds of Skyrim Complete SE
ui_sounds.desc: Adds over 460 new sound effects to the wilderness. Sounds play according to weather, time of day and region.

ui_sounds.name: Audio Overhaul for Skyrim SE
ui_sounds.desc: Tweaks distance and volume, major improvements to footsteps and destruction magic sounds. Improves traps, creatures, weapons, ambience and more. Adds environment-based reverb.

ui_sounds.name: Immersive Sounds - Compendium
ui_sounds.desc: A comprehensive sound overhaul. During install, select your choice of sounds for weaponry, magic footsteps, and misc. Multiple options for many sounds. Author recommends using with [Audio Overhaul for Skyrim](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43773).

ui_sounds.name: More Sound Options (WIP)
ui_sounds.desc:
Adds volume controls for vanilla sounds - NPC footsteps, Menu sounds, waterfalls, Weapon draw sounds, etc. Useful for increasing the sound of waterfalls and distant loud noises such as hammering.
Compatible with SSE.

ui_sounds.name: Quiet Dungeons and Caves
ui_sounds.desc: Removes looping wind noise from dungeons.

ui_sounds.name: Activate Fail Noise Removal
ui_sounds.desc:
Removes annoying fail noise.
Compatible with SSE.

ui_sounds.name: SILENT Skyrim - Quieter Interface
ui_sounds.desc:
Can replace nearly 2 dozen annoying sound effects with silent .wav file - sneak attack "clunk", activate fail noise, level-up noises, crafting noises, nirn root ringing, and many more.
Compatible with SSE.

ui_sounds.name: Skyrim User Interface Silencer
ui_sounds.desc:
Same as above mod, but uses a different method of choosing which sounds to removes.
Compatible with SSE.

ui_sounds.name: Waterbreathing Breathless Emerge SSE
ui_sounds.desc: Water emerging breath sound no longer plays if under the effect of water breathing.

ui_sounds.name: Underwater Swimming SFX Fix
ui_sounds.desc:
Corrects/improves underwater sound for better immersion.
Compatible with SSE.

ui_sounds.name: Realistic Husky Sounds
ui_sounds.desc: Adds over 60 all-new, high-quality husky sounds to the Dawnguard huskies.

ui_sounds.name: Better Horse Pain Sounds
ui_sounds.desc:
Much better sound for horses that get hit/hurt.
Compatible with SSE.

ui_sounds.name: FSS - Better Bards
ui_sounds.desc:
Improves timing of bard singing.
Compatible with SSE.

ui_sounds.name: Thundering shouts
ui_sounds.desc: Cooler shouts - Adds some echo to shouts + a thunder sound + 10% lower pitch.

ui_sounds.name: Better Animal Footsteps
ui_sounds.desc:
Makes footstep sounds for 16+ animals more realistic (e.g. rabbits, spiders, mammoths, horkers, mudcrabs, deer, bear, etc.).
Compatible with SSE.

ui_sounds.name: IHSS - Improved Horse Step Sounds
ui_sounds.desc: Improves the "hoovestep" sounds of horses by adding "sound sets" for different grounds.

ui_sounds.name: Ultra Realistic Bow Shoot Sounds
ui_sounds.desc:
Makes bow sounds more realistic.
Compatible with SSE.

ui_sounds.name: Improved Combat Sounds SE
ui_sounds.desc: Improves combat sounds.

ui_sounds.name: Smooth Blade Draw and Sheath SE
ui_sounds.desc: Quieter sound when drawing or sheathing a blade. When in sneak mode, your character will attack silently instead of yelling with each swing plus weapon sounds are quieter.

ui_sounds.name: True Medieval Tavern Music
ui_sounds.desc: Replaces vanilla music you hear in bars/s with true medieval music from long ago. Compatible with SSE?

ui_sounds.name: Immersive Music
ui_sounds.desc: Adds 16 hours of lore-friendly music to the existing 3.5 hours of vanilla music. Hand-selected by Hothtrooper44. Appropriate music type will play based on location/activity.

ui_sounds.name: Fantasy Soundtrack Project SE
ui_sounds.desc: Adds 800+ minutes of new music. 235+ different tracks. Optionally has 20 combat tracks. Has replacer and non-replacer options.

ui_animations.name: No Spinning Death Animation
ui_animations.desc: Removes the unrealistic spinning death animation. Ragdoll physics used instead. Will not affect killmoves.

ui_animations.name: No heavy muscular walk and idle
ui_animations.desc: Makes NPCs and character stand and walk normally instead of appearing overly musclebound.

ui_animations.name: Run Sprint and Jump
ui_animations.desc: Improves animations for run, sprint and jump (males and females).

ui_animations.name: Bowlegged jump animation Fix
ui_animations.desc: Fixes the bowlegged jump animations for both males and females.

ui_animations.name: Dragon Animation Replace
ui_animations.desc: Dragons raise their head higher while on the ground and adds animations for attacks like dragon shout and tail slam.

ui_animations.name: Faster GET UP STAND UP animation
ui_animations.desc: Edits the stand up animation to be twice as fast while maintaining realism.

ui_animations.name: Dovahkiin Relaxes Too
ui_animations.desc: Use one shout to activate an animation appropriate for the object you cast it upon e.g. 'sit', 'sleep', 'warm hands by fire', 'sit and eat/drink' 'pray', 'lean on wall/counter', 'feed chicken', etc.

ui_animations.name: Simple Actions
ui_animations.desc: Let the player perform a few simple actions anywhere: sit anywhere, meditate anywhere and sleep anywhere (with actual sleep menu).

ui_animations.name: Sit Anywhere
ui_animations.desc: Allows you or you followers to sit anywhere. Adds 4 lesser powers to 'sit cross-legged', 'sit on a ledge', 'create a cross-legged sitting spot' or 'create a ledge sitting spot'

ui_animations.name: 360 Walk and Run Plus
ui_animations.desc: Lets your character walk in a 360-degree circle while in 3rd person with weapon sheathed i.e. character can now walk toward you instead of back stepping.

ui_animations.name: 360 Movement Behavior SE
ui_animations.desc: An alternative 360 movement mod for movement, jumping, and swimming. It doesn't replace any animations, it just changes the behaviour files so it should be compatible with any animation mods.

ui_animations.name: Immersive Animations
ui_animations.desc: Improves several 3rd person animations giving player a more relaxed stance when wielding weapons.

ui_animations.name: Dual Wield Improved Animation
ui_animations.desc: Improves dual wield animations for idle, turning, running, normal attack and power attack. Makes movements more fluid.

ui_animations.name: YY Anim Replacer - Mystic Knight
ui_animations.desc: Replaces one-handed sword and magic animations. Designed to fit a character with a sword in one hand and magic in the other.

ui_animations.name: New Animation for Magic Casting
ui_animations.desc: Improves animations for casting magic. Note: It is safe, per the author, to delete any animation file that you don't like.

ui_animations.name: 3rd Person Dual Wield Animation Fix
ui_animations.desc: Improves the 3rd person idle turn and sprint animation while dual wielding weapons.

ui_animations.name: Running with your Bow Replacer
ui_animations.desc: Improves 3 bow animations for RunForward, RunForwardLeft & RunForwardRight.

ui_animations.name: Casual bow animations
ui_animations.desc: Improves 22 bow animations for standing idle, walking, running and turning with a bow.

ui_animations.name: Cinematic Dragon Soul Absorbtion
ui_animations.desc: Improves music and animation when absorbing a dragon soul.

character_creation.name: Character Creation Overhaul
character_creation.desc: No more master of everything - Choose from 21 distinct classes, each with benefits/deficiencies. Dynamic skill progression (optional) - class-specific skills advance faster (click [here](http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=93543416&searchtext=) for optional "Permanent Birthsigns" add-on). Compatible with [SkyRe](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9286)

character_creation.name: Proteus
character_creation.desc: Play as multiple characters within the same game world, on the same save game file - all with their own unique appearance, perks, spells, items, and stats.

character_creation.name: ApachiiSkyHair
character_creation.desc: 300K+ endorsements. Adds over 200 new hairstyle options for men and women.

character_creation.name: Beards
character_creation.desc: Adds braided beards (made by Bethesda but were hidden in the CK). Also improves textures of all beards (optional)

character_creation.name: Brows
character_creation.desc: A complete eyebrow retexture featuring high quality and lore-friendly choices. Designed to compliment [Beards](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/1067).

character_creation.name: Bald Head
character_creation.desc: Adds a bald head to the hair options.

character_creation.name: RaceMenu
character_creation.desc: 300K+ endorsements. A complete overhaul of the character creation interface. Adds many more character customization options.

character_creation.name: Enhanced Character Edit
character_creation.desc: Adds many new sliders to character creation menu. Adds new options for lips, eyes, eyebrows, etc. Works with any body mesh. Includes a new race (pretty female).

character_creation.name: Player Size Adjuster and 1st Person Camera Height Fix
character_creation.desc: Use SkyUI MCM to adjust your character's height as well as your height when transformed into a werewolf or Vampire Lord. It will automatically adjust your 1st person height to match. Optionally can adjust run speed and jump height based on height.

alternate_starts.name: Alternate Start - Live Another Life
alternate_starts.desc: Adds various alternative starting points. All choices start at level 1, with the Dragonborn quest being optional.

alternate_starts.name: New Beginnings - Live Another Life Extension
alternate_starts.desc: A large expansion for [Alternate Start - Live Another Life](https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/272) that adds 14 new alternate starts.

alternate_starts.name: Skyrim Unbound Reborn (Alternate Start)
alternate_starts.desc: Lets you choose a starting class and where you want to start. Lets you choose if you want to play as the Dragonborn (NPCs will not talk about Helgen or recognize you as the Dragonborn). Toggle starting spells, dragons, random dragon spawns, dragon soul absorption, and shouts.

alternate_starts.name: RASR - Random Alternate Start Reborn
alternate_starts.desc: A completely random start - choose from 21 class starting kits and start in one of 463+ locations.

alternate_starts.name: Dimes Quickstart
alternate_starts.desc: Skip cart ride, attack, and dungeon. Choose your race & whether you followed Stormcloak or Imperial.

alternate_starts.name: Starting Spell Choice
alternate_starts.desc: Removes Healing & Flames spells & allows player to choose 1 novice spell (or none) from each Magic school.

starter_homes.name: Campsite - The Small Getaway
starter_homes.desc: Start the game with a small tent campsite. Click [here](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28484) and [here](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38253) for other tent mods.

starter_homes.name: Snapneck Shack
starter_homes.desc: A shack in a tree with no load doors located between Riverwood and Whiterun.

starter_homes.name: Beginner's Shack
starter_homes.desc: Mod adds a very tiny house with basic amenities just outside Riverwood main gate. Good for a first home for your character.

starter_homes.name: Riverside Shack
starter_homes.desc: Riverside Shack is an old abandoned dwelling just southwest of Windhelm, east of Gallows Rock and along the White River.

starter_homes.name: Woodsman's Shack
starter_homes.desc: A Ranger or Hunter player home - a rustic hunting shack in southeastern Skyrim with no load entry (and no front door). Includes all crafting stations, storage and weapon racks.

starter_homes.name: Snowberry Cottage
starter_homes.desc: Rebuild from the ashes! After destroying the vampires seeking to enslave Morthal, you can now rebuild Hroggar's ruined house into Snowberry Cottage - a quaint, lore-friendly player home that includes all crafting stations, ample storage, a child's bedroom, and an optional library and trophy room.

starter_homes.name: Anoriths Shack
starter_homes.desc: A small, cozy hunter's shack (with hidden grotto) in the southwest near Lake Ilinalta. Bed, cooking pot, alchemy station, chopping block, tanning rack and small garden. (Hidden grotto has smithing and many other amenities)

starter_homes.name: Hunters Cabin of Riverwood
starter_homes.desc: A cozy hunter's cabin available as soon as you start the game. Storage chests, Book Shelf, Cooking pot, tanning rack and grinding stone, archery target, and more.

starter_homes.name: Kneirim Farmhouse
starter_homes.desc: A small, simple farmhouse east of Rorikstead. Companion/spouse compatible (navmeshed). 1 cow, 4 chickens, workbench, tanning rack, woodchopping, various crops, storage, weapon racks, renewing sacks and barrels.

character_leveling.name: Skyrim -Community- Uncapper
character_leveling.desc: \[SKSE\] Set your own custom skill level caps, experience earning rate of each skill, the relation between skill leveling and player leveling, number of perks, Health points, Magicka points, Stamina points, and/or "Carry Weight" points gained at a specific level up. ([Click here](http://www.skyrimgems.com/uncapper.html) for additional documentation/explanation of the .ini options) [Click here](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21569) for a spreadsheet to help calculate your values)

character_leveling.name: ERSO 13.02 - Lower Skill Gain
character_leveling.desc: (An indpendent, standalone module of [ERSO \_ Erkeil Real Skyrim Overhaul](http://erkeilmods.altervista.org/skyrim/)). Makes all skills progress 10-60% slower (choose from 8 options) with the exception of Pickpocket, Alchemy, Speech, Enchanting and Smithing...which progress even slower.

character_leveling.name: Slower leveling up with tutorial
character_leveling.desc: Leveling is 2,3,4 or 5 times slower (choose). Compatible with [Character Creation Overhaul](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21587). (Click [here](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24422/) for similar version with slower leveling for Enchant & Pickpocket)

character_leveling.name: SXP - Skyrim Experience Mod
character_leveling.desc: \[SKSE\] A new skill leveling overhaul. Earn XP by completing quests, visiting a new location, defeating a foe, etc. Spend XP to level up any skill. Requires [Community Uncapper](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1175).

character_leveling.name: SkyXP
character_leveling.desc: \[SKSE\] A skill leveling overhaul. Earn XP by completing quests, visiting a new location, defeating a foe etc. Spend XP to level up any skill. Requires [Community Uncapper](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1175).

character_leveling.name: Katixas Skill Lock Cap
character_leveling.desc: Allows you to set a cap (limit) for each skill individually (e.g. roleplay a warrior so magic skills cap at 15). Or try [Skills Config](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34307) as an alternative.

character_leveling.name: Reflection
character_leveling.desc: Like Oblivion, perk points are allocated after sleeping.

character_leveling.name: Immersive Leveling
character_leveling.desc: Perks no longer gained through leveling. All perks are earned through reading books or through trainers. Books are in locations relevant to their content (e.g. mage books at College of Winterhold). Now with scaling perk efficiency (e.g. the higher your skills, the better the perks) and uncapper presets to get perks the vanilla way. Requires [Skyrim -Community- Uncapper](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1175).

character_leveling.name: Skill Book Overhaul
character_leveling.desc: Doubles the amount of unique, lore-friendly skill books in the game from 90 to 180 (for those who prefer to level more through adventuring and studying...and for collectors)

carry_weight.desc: Use the console (~) to permanently set a new Carry Weight for your character. (NOTE: Vanilla CarryWeight is 300... plus 5 each time you upgrade Stamina)

carry_weight.name: More Believable Carrying Weight
carry_weight.desc: Lowers carry weight for player, followers and NPCs from 300 (vanilla) to 75-135 depending on race. No other changes made.

carry_weight.name: SkyRealism - Capacity and Carry Weight
carry_weight.desc: \[SKSE\]\[DG\] Hardcore carry weight mod - sets base CarryWeight equal to weight of equipped items plus 50 (need bandoliers and backpacks to add weight)

carry_weight.name: SkyRealism - Encumbrance
carry_weight.desc: \[SKSE\]\[DG\] Hardcore encumbrance mod - Option 1: Movement speed is modified based on how much weight you're carrying and your average skill level. Option 2: Use [this tweak mod](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41862) to have excessive weight reduce stamina while running instead of reducing movement speed.

carry_weight.name: DFB Carry Weight Per Stamina
carry_weight.desc: Carry Weight increases by x amount for each Stamina point gained where x = 1 - 20 (player choice)

carry_weight.name: More Realistic Carrying
carry_weight.desc: Armor that youre wearing weighs 80% less. (Useful when lowering Carry Weight to realistic levels)

carry_weight.name: Encumbering loot armour and weapons
carry_weight.desc: Unequipped armour and weapons have an encumbrance penalty of 2.25 time their normal weight (multiplier is configurable)

carry_weight.name: EK_LimitedItems
carry_weight.desc: Sets player-configurable limits on max # of items that can be carried for arrows, potions, lockpicks and more. Offers 2 methods for limiting armor and weapons: 1) Items take up space, individually defined by item class (like Diablo). 2) Player defines max numbers per weapon class. Compatible with Bandolier - Bags and Pouches and Sabre Gear in Frosftall.

carry_weight.name: TCSO - Total Carryweight System Overhaul
carry_weight.desc: Lowers Carry Weight by race (85-130) & limits the # of items of a specific type you can carry (e.g. 20 Potions, 30 Arrows, 1 2-handed sword, 1 set of heavy armor, etc). Can use an in-game book to configure weights/options

backpacks_storage.name: Bandolier - Bags and Pouches
backpacks_storage.desc: Adds a variety of bags and pouches that increase carry weight. 5 new slots for equipment: Chest, Back Left, Back Right, Front Left and Front Right. Also consider [Bandolier for NPCs](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17805) and [Bandolier - Decreased carry weight and lower prices](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17879)

backpacks_storage.name: Functional Bags
backpacks_storage.desc: Adds item-specific type bags that help to auto-sort your inventory. They reduce weight of items within by 20% (40% when the bag is worn). Certain bags can be worn on the right side or swapped to the left side on the spot.

backpacks_storage.name: Knapsack Enhanced
backpacks_storage.desc: Adds a craftable dynamic backpack that automatically adds/removes visible items when used/acquired e.g. Axe, pickaxe, tent, torch, pot and pan, waterskin, etc. Adds 75 carry weight. Requires Frostfall.

backpacks_storage.name: Mage Backpack by Tumbajamba
backpacks_storage.desc: Adds a craftable backpack that adds 70 carry weight and +15 magic resistance.

backpacks_storage.name: Leather Backpack
backpacks_storage.desc: Adds a leather backpack that adds 50, 100 or 300 carry capacity (choose one)

backpacks_storage.name: Nordic Ranger Outfit
backpacks_storage.desc: Adds a craftable leather armor set. One of the 6 pieces is a ranger backpack that adds 15 CarryWeight (does not conflict with Bandolier - Bags and Pouches)

backpacks_storage.name: FrankDema Travel BackPack
backpacks_storage.desc: Adds a craftable backpack that increases CarryWeight 50 points. Very similar to Nordic Ranger backpack except a sword is always displayed as part of the backpack and has 50 carryweight instead of 15.

backpacks_storage.name: Fur Bag - Backpack
backpacks_storage.desc: Adds a fur bag that adds 50 carry capacity

backpacks_storage.name: Sabre Gear Backpack
backpacks_storage.desc: Improves on Fur bag - adds Fur Traveler's bag (+50 CarryWeight) & Fur Survivor's Bag (+100 CarryWeight). 3 colors each.

backpacks_storage.name: Knapsack Backpacks
backpacks_storage.desc: Adds 20 craftable backpacks (4 sizes and 5 colors) that add a variety of carry capacities. Thin goes underneath bows and quivers. Huge covers bows and quivers. Positions automatically adjust if worn with cloaks.

backpacks_storage.name: Loot Later
backpacks_storage.desc: \[SKSE\] Craft empty sacks and when encumbered, drop them on the ground and move some of your loot to it for later retrieval. Holds up to 150 units of weight. Mark up to 16 sacks on the map.

backpacks_storage.name: Blacksmith Storage Chests
backpacks_storage.desc: Talk to the blacksmith in each city to buy a non-respawning storage chest to store your crafting supplies. Chest can auto-sort your supplies (optional) and contents can be shared between cities (optional)

backpacks_storage.name: Shockys Safe Chests
backpacks_storage.desc: Adds 43 player-owned, non-respawning storage chests to inns and many other logical, helpful locations. Contents are not linked. (NOTE: [Realistic Room Rental](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25029) also adds player-owned chests)

backpacks_storage.name: Storage Helpers
backpacks_storage.desc: Craft pouches, chests, sacks, barrels and place anywhere. Move, rotate, resize, or rename anything. Convert bandoliers, pouches, and backpacks into wearable containers. Quick access to teammate and saddlebag inventories. Put multiple items into a container with 1 click. Store quest items. More...

backpacks_storage.name: Craftable Cloud Storage
backpacks_storage.desc: Adds craftable, placeable, automated, heuristic, centralized storage to simplify inventory management. Place anywhere. (A user-friendly adaptation of "[General Stores - storage resource for packrats](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18340)").

backpacks_storage.name: Arod's Better Containers
backpacks_storage.desc: Store customizable sets of items into \*any\* container/s (local or remote) with one click. Use 50+ presets or cast "Learn" and then later cast "Stash" to auto-store. Retrieve from up to 6 remote containers. Move or Rename any containers (i.e. "Sack" can become "Filled Soulgems"). Craft different kinds of containers and place anywhere + more...

backpacks_storage.name: Buildable Chests and Containers
backpacks_storage.desc: Craft your own non respawning chests and place them anywhere (not shared)

item_weight.name: All Items Weight Adjustments
item_weight.desc: A full realistic weight adjustment for every single item in Skyrim

item_weight.name: SkyRealism - Mass and Materials
item_weight.desc: Alters the weight of all items in the game by converting their weights to pounds. Adjusts the crafting recipes to account for conservation of mass and the materials observed on the crafted items.

item_weight.name: Realistic Coin Weight
item_weight.desc: Renames gold to Septims. Coins now have a real weight of 0.014 lbs (6.5g) each.

item_weight.name: Ishs Weighted Gold
item_weight.desc: Gives gold coins weight. Each coin weighs 0.01 units, so 100 coins is one unit.

item_weight.name: Pricier and Heavier Pelts and Hides
item_weight.desc: Pelts and hides weigh more (and are worth more)

item_weight.name: Realistic Weapon Weights
item_weight.desc: Reweight of all the weapons to historically accurate weights

item_weight.name: Rolinors Realistically Weighted Weapons
item_weight.desc: Makes the weight of weapons in the game closer to a realistic weight.

item_weight.name: Lightweight Scrolls - Multilingual
item_weight.desc: Lowers the weight of all scrolls (including DLCs) from 0.5 to 0.1. Multilingual ([older mod](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2227))

item_weight.name: Lightweight Potions and Poisons
item_weight.desc: Lowers the weight of crafted potions and poisons from 0.5 to 0.1. Multilingual. Also reweights DawnGuard potions if installed.

item_weight.name: Scale Tipper
item_weight.desc: \[SKSE\] Dynamically reweights all potions, poisons and scrolls in the game to a player-configurable weight every time the game loads to avoid conflicts with other mods (i.e. weight changes do not overwrite objects in savegame)

item_weight.name: Rebalanced Potion Weight
item_weight.desc: Modifies potion weights according to size (0.1 - 0.6) see image.

item_weight.name: Ingredient Reweight
item_weight.desc: Reduces some ingredient weights and increases some alchemical death items

item_weight.name: Less Annoying Items
item_weight.desc: Reduces weight of many minor items like firewood and bowls

item_weight.name: Axe and Pickaxe Weight Overhaul
item_weight.desc: Reduces weight of axe & pickaxe by 50% to a more realistic weight (from 10 to 5)

item_weight.name: Customizable Weights
item_weight.desc: \[SKSE\] Adds a Spell and a Power to change the weight of any item in-game. Cast a spell on an item in front of you or use a Power to open a menu of items. No longer supported. Source code provided.

gameplay_overhaul.name: T3nd0s Skyrim Redone
gameplay_overhaul.desc: A modular, full gameplay overhaul - Changes races, perks, combat, weapons, armor, magic, thievery, crafting, enchanting, alchemy, standing stones, enemies, encounters and more \*\* Watch essential [video by Gopher](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UfR2Sts6jXM)! \*\* Use [ReProccer](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28467/) to fix stats. [Click here](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33995) for SkyRe guide. [Click here](http://www.reddit.com/r/skyrimmods/comments/1kyz5r/mods_that_go_well_with_skyre/) for a list of recommended mods to go with SkyRe.

gameplay_overhaul.name: T3nd0's Perkus Maximus
gameplay_overhaul.desc: \[SKSE\] \[DG\] \[DB\] The successor to Skyrim Redone and more compliant with other mods. ([Compatibility Patches](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59257/)). Large-scale perk and gameplay overhaul by T3nd0, creator of Skyrim Redone. Hundreds of new perks, spells and pieces of gear with advanced mechanics.

gameplay_overhaul.name: Requiem
gameplay_overhaul.desc: \[SKSE\] \[DG\] A hardcore realism overhaul mod - Different race stats, Start with lower skills. No Health Regen and slower Magicka Regen. No fasttravel. **De-leveled encounters & loot**. Less UI sounds. Weapons & arrows do more dmg. Armor protects more. Smarter enemy AI. Harder lockpicking and sneaking. Lower CarryWeight. Arrows & gold have weight. Cutthroat merchants. Increased falling dmg. 1st person messages. New weapons, foods, recipes...Revised perk tree, spells, enchanting, shouts, standing stones, shrines, and much much more! [Click here](http://www.reddit.com/r/skyrimrequiem) for Requiem discussion forum

gameplay_overhaul.name: SPERG - Skyrim Perk Enhancements and Rebalanced Gameplay
gameplay_overhaul.desc: A balanced perk tree overhaul intended to create more diversified characters with more unique gameplay. An alternative to SkyRe.

gameplay_overhaul.name: ACE - Combat Skills
gameplay_overhaul.desc: A modular overhaul - Changes combat mechanics, archery (makes long bows and light bows different), armor (makes heavy and light armor different), enchanting, magic, melee perks (makes 1H and 2H different), smithing and speech. Also includes a utitlity (BYOG) to adjust dozens of gameplay attributes in-game (usable with any game). DawnGuard patch available

gameplay_overhaul.name: Skyrim Unleashed
gameplay_overhaul.desc: Enemies are still leveled but much more difficult. To compensate, enemies don't attack on sight. Loot is unleveled but rare items are VERY rare and VERY expensive. Eating meat gives bonus to weapon dmg, Sweets give bonus to Magicka regen rate. Much more. Designed to work with several other popular mods.

gameplay_overhaul.name: ERSO _ Erkeil Real Skyrim Overhaul
gameplay_overhaul.desc: An overhaul using over 25 (optional) modules - Unleveled encounters, modified level progression, more varied races, harder encounters with better AI, stronger NPCs and followers, new travelers and NPCs, and more.

miscellaneous_gameplay.name: Morrowloot
miscellaneous_gameplay.desc: Player can no longer craft Daedric, Orcish, glass, Elven or Dwemer. Must find (logically placed). Removes higher lvl objects from levelled loot lists. Adds them back in as static objects hidden in logical places (Dwemer items in dwemer ruins, Orcish items carried by orcs etc.) Click [here](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/44212/) or [here](http://forums.bethsoft.com/topic/1387319-relz-morrowloot/page__st__180__p__21968693#entry21968693) or [here](http://tesalliance.org/forums/index.php?/files/file/1412-morrowloot/) for optional download source by author.) Also consider [Unofficial Morrowloot-Skyrim Overhaul](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50995/)

miscellaneous_gameplay.name: The secret of steel
miscellaneous_gameplay.desc: Changes the leveled item list so there are no longer fantasy (Elven, Dwarven, Orcish, etc) weapons and armor in the game. Only iron, steel, plate, scaled weapons and armor (and hide and leather of course). [Click here for DLC patches and tweaks](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35750)

miscellaneous_gameplay.name: Immersive Loot and Cells
miscellaneous_gameplay.desc: Completely removes Dwarven, Ebony, Glass, Elven, Daedric, Dragonplate & Dragonscale armor,weapons & arrows from most sources (still craftable). Removes enchanted and unenchanted weapons and armor. Orc hunters use Orcish armor/weapons. Removes rare ingots/ores from leveled lists.

miscellaneous_gameplay.name: Civil War Overhaul
miscellaneous_gameplay.desc: \[SKSE\] Improves gameplay of Civil War. Battles can be lost and affects game. Improves soldier AI and diversity. Soldiers react to what armor you wear + more

miscellaneous_gameplay.name: SkyTweak - Skyrim Balance Tweaker
miscellaneous_gameplay.desc: \[SKSE\] A modern replacement of [BYOG - Balance Your Own Game](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18474) that lets you edit over 200 game settings in game ([view all settings](https://sites.google.com/site/grimyskyrim/my-mods/skytweak)) through the MCM menu that affect combat, magic, stealth, attributes and much more. Displays modded values from other installed mods and lets you edit them further. Adds hotkey casting (spell does not have to be equipped to cast).

miscellaneous_gameplay.name: Dynamic Potions - Poisons - Ingredients - Food
miscellaneous_gameplay.desc: Use the MCM menu to view and modify numerous game properties for food, potions, ingredients and poisons - strength, duration, prices, weight, apply effects over time, etc. All DLC's supported but not required.

miscellaneous_gameplay.name: Treebalance - Speech Tree
miscellaneous_gameplay.desc:
*   Lets you try yielding to an opponent if losing (in exchange for a little gold).
*   Adds the option of sparing an opponent's life in exchange for gold. (improvves speech skill)
*   Reorganizes the speech tree into 3 forks: Criminal Perks (Bribe and Fence), Salesman Perks (Allure, Merchant, Investor, Master Trader), and Speaking perks (Persuasion, Intimidate)

miscellaneous_gameplay.name: SIS - Skyrim immersion set
miscellaneous_gameplay.desc: A collection of game enhancements that improve immersion and realism - timescale = 8, slower leveling progression, traps are deadlier, dragons spawn 3x slower, merchants have more gold, slower dungeon respawn times, fall dmg = 2x vanilla, higher crime bounties, lower crime range, droppable Barenziah stones, followers will get out of your way more, lockpicks and gold have weight, No NPC greetings, carriages cost more, improved stealth.

miscellaneous_gameplay.name: Project Ultimatum - Gameplay and Roleplay Enhancement
miscellaneous_gameplay.desc: \[SKSE\] Adds or improves up to 12 gameplay features (configurable) - Look at the sun to get the time, tackle enemies, sitting gives a rest bonus, usable grain mills, animated praying and more.

miscellaneous_gameplay.name: Death Alternative - Your Money or Your Life
miscellaneous_gameplay.desc: \[SKSE\] Adds a framework for defeat scenarios dozens of possible outcomes - from the player's gear being stolen by bandits to being rescued by a dashing adventurer. Continue playing even after you are defeated and live with the consequences. Extremely configurable and expansible.

miscellaneous_gameplay.name: SM Essential Player
miscellaneous_gameplay.desc: \[SKSE\] Dying knocks you to the ground and incurs 5 minutes of penalties. Dying again too soon turns you into a ghost for 5 minutes or 2 game hrs. Can recover loot from dead body. (optional mode: all non-quest loot is lost)

miscellaneous_gameplay.name: Achieve That
miscellaneous_gameplay.desc: \[SKSE\] Adds over 100 achievements to the game that bestow player benefits when unlocked (e.g. Read 50 books, clear 10 dungeons, etc)

miscellaneous_gameplay.name: Sometimes Pick Up Books
miscellaneous_gameplay.desc: \[SKSE\] Press shift key to just take a book instead of reading it immediately. (Lets you wait to read/study around the campfire or inn)

miscellaneous_gameplay.name: Non-Automatic Skill Books
miscellaneous_gameplay.desc: Lets you choose if and when you gain a skill from a book (i.e. Don't read in dungeon. Wait to read/study around the campfire or at an inn). Prompted to learn skill when closing the book. It also adds the name of the skill being leveled to the name of the book i.e. "(Light Armor) The Refugees"

miscellaneous_gameplay.name: Read And Learn Speechcraft Speech
miscellaneous_gameplay.desc: Reading books of a certain type increases speech skill - history, poems, stories & tales. (Small skill increase from reading a 2nd time). (Note: Different copies of the same book will increase skill again)

miscellaneous_gameplay.name: RTR - Real Time Reading
miscellaneous_gameplay.desc: 2-4 hrs (random) will pass when reading a book with added animation. Alternatives: [Living Takes Time](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/44623/) or [Professions](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18258).

miscellaneous_gameplay.name: Glowing Ore Veins 300
miscellaneous_gameplay.desc: Ore veins glow so theyre more detectable. ([click here](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19269) for a version with less glow)

miscellaneous_gameplay.name: Faster Mining
miscellaneous_gameplay.desc: Strike ore deposit 3 times instead of 9 when mining (same yield)

miscellaneous_gameplay.name: Mining Extended
miscellaneous_gameplay.desc: Mine 1 ore per cycle for every 10 points of smithing (i.e. Smithing of 60 yields 6 ore)

miscellaneous_gameplay.name: Non Stop Mining And Chopping
miscellaneous_gameplay.desc: Hardcore realism - Ore veins are infinite but mining ore takes 4 times longer than Vanilla. (Infinite wood, too)

miscellaneous_gameplay.name: DFB - Disabled Woodchop Anim
miscellaneous_gameplay.desc: Removes the long animation for wood cutting. (Only affects Player)

miscellaneous_gameplay.name: RP Chopping and Mining
miscellaneous_gameplay.desc: Ore veins are infinite but mining and chopping wood takes time. Click on ore|wood and push "wait" to advance time. Receive x ore|wood per hour (variable by ore type). Works well with Hunger/Thirst mods.

miscellaneous_gameplay.name: More Firewood per Chop
miscellaneous_gameplay.desc: Changes the number of firewood given per chop to 4, 5, 6, 10, 20 or 99

miscellaneous_gameplay.name: Wood Chopping To Max Carry Weight
miscellaneous_gameplay.desc: Player will chop wood until inventory is full (without becoming encumbered)

miscellaneous_gameplay.name: Acquisitive Soul Gems Multithreaded
miscellaneous_gameplay.desc: The successor to [Acquisitive Soul Gems](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5312). Prevents trapping, for example, a petty soul in a greater soul gem. Includes MCM configuration options.

miscellaneous_gameplay.name: Training Dummies and Targets
miscellaneous_gameplay.desc: Practice Dummies will now train your Archery, One Handed, Two Handed, and Destruction skills (Fire, Frost, or Shock). Archery increases more the further back you are from the target.

miscellaneous_gameplay.name: Dragon Soul Relinquishment
miscellaneous_gameplay.desc: Lets you exchange dragon souls at High Hrothgar for faster shout recovery, stronger shout powers, perk points, increased unarmed dmg or increased carry weight. (Compatible with SkyRe)

miscellaneous_gameplay.name: Improved Dragon Shouts
miscellaneous_gameplay.desc: Makes shouts much more powerful. (higher damage, longer duration, shorter cooldown and/or wider radius) Overpowered on Adept difficulty or lower.

miscellaneous_gameplay.name: DragonFire - Tactically Enhanced Breath Shouts
miscellaneous_gameplay.desc: Changes the effects, damage, and visuals for the Fire and Frost Breath shouts to more closely resemble dragon's breath (i.e. more powerful)

miscellaneous_gameplay.name: Third Era Attributes for Skyrim
miscellaneous_gameplay.desc: Attribute system overhaul - Adds 8 attributes that you can level - Strength, Endurance, Intelligence, Willpower, Agility, Speed, Personality & Luck. Each attribute affects gameplay appropriately.

miscellaneous_gameplay.name: Perks Unbound - Dawnguard Supported
miscellaneous_gameplay.desc: Removes all perk prerequisites. Skip right to the perk you want. (Skill level requirements unchanged). Replaces "[No Perk Prerequisites](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1943)"

miscellaneous_gameplay.name: DUT - Expanded Perks
miscellaneous_gameplay.desc: \[DG\] A modular expansion of the Vanilla perks to provide additional/different specialization paths.

miscellaneous_gameplay.name: Skyrim Unlimited Rings And Amulets
miscellaneous_gameplay.desc: Allows player to wear multiple rings and amulets at the same time. (Extra rings & amulets are not visible but their enchantments will work) (Use [EK\_LimitedItems](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11322) to limit number of rings and amulets to your choice)

miscellaneous_gameplay.name: Left Hand Rings
miscellaneous_gameplay.desc: Adds left-handed rings (craftable, enchantable and will will randomly appear in merchant inventories and treasure chests). Allows player and NPCs to visibly wear a ring on each hand in 3rd person view. (Use [this mod](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41824/) to make them also visible in 1st person view). Try [Left Hand Rings Modified](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58491/) for a modified version that uses a different body slot number.

miscellaneous_gameplay.name: TwoRings
miscellaneous_gameplay.desc: Lets you wear up to two rings. Only one ring is displayed on character but enchantments from both rings will work.

creature_levels.name: WTF - Random Encounter Zones
creature_levels.desc:
(by T3nd0, author of SkyRe) Lets player assign the range of encounter levels (min and max) for each encounter zone. Highly configurable/customizable.  
**Similar alternatives:** [PermaZONES - Dangerous Encounter Zones for Skyrim](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63349/), [SkyRe-Encounter Zones](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9286/), [ERSO 08](http://erkeilmods.altervista.org/skyrim/r-s-o/) (the Encounter Zones Module), and [ASIS-Encounter Zones](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18436/)

creature_levels.name: Skyrim Scaling Stopper
creature_levels.desc: A leveled list overhaul - Most enemies are not leveled (20% lvl 1-15 | 77% Lvl 15-20 | 3% lvl 21+). Weapons & armor of higher quality than steel are rare. Treasure is not leveled.

creature_levels.name: High Level Enemies
creature_levels.desc: After level 10, begins adding higher-level versions of existing creatures to keep game challenging. Optional file raises average level of encounters to be closer to player's level. More...

economy.name: Trade and Barter
economy.desc: \[SKSE\] Adds many user-adjustable factors to bartering such as status, race, location, knowledge, etiquette, etc. Compatible SkyRe.

economy.name: Trade Routes
economy.desc: \[SKSE\] The successor to Economics of Skyrim - dynamically adjusts the gold value and merchant supply of trade goods to create profitable trade routes. Compatible with SkyRe, DLCs and others.

economy.name: Scarcity
economy.desc: Makes loot 2x to 10x less likely to find inside containers, dead creatures, and dead NPCs. Merchants will have 2x to 10x less rare items. Compatible with all mods.

economy.name: Gold Adjustment
economy.desc: Reduces excessive income by dynamically adjusting gold, gems, lockpicks and soul gems acquired from chests and gold from coin purses and quest rewards (Configurable). NOTE: Reduced quest rewards display a "Gold Removed" message. Reduced Gold Rewards for Quests can be used with this mod to reduce quest rewards and avoid the "Gold Removed" message.

economy.name: Darwins Nightmare
economy.desc: Although outdated, the mod's download file contains several modular plugins that people still find useful such as DarwinsHT\_less\_gold.esp, DarwinsPT\_less\_food75.esp, DarwinsHT\_less\_soulgems.esp

economy.name: Perseids Inns and Taverns - Realistic Room Rental
economy.desc: \[SKSE\] Basic version - MCM to adjust room cost. No DLC req'd. Compatible with everything. Enhanced version requires HF and DB DLC and adds extended stay option, safe-storage containers, pay for followers, adds bathtubs, loyal patron discounts, and more...

economy.name: Investment Price Config
economy.desc: \[HF\] Use MCM to adjust the price of player homes, player home upgrades, horses and mercenaries. (Can set a different price multiplier for each type)

economy.name: Expensive Investments
economy.desc: Increases the price of houses, furniture, horses and followers by 2.5x, 5x or 10x

economy.name: EPM - Easy Pocket Money
economy.desc: Increases value and decreases weight of 60+ items that thieves might steal from homes (e.g. silver bowls, cups, goblets, etc)

economy.name: Golden Vendors
economy.desc: Merchants have more gold and 1 day restock. Choose: Vendors have X times more gold (x2, x3, x5 or x10) or vendors have exact amt of gold (2k, 5k, 10k or 20k)

economy.name: Rich Merchants
economy.desc: Merchants have 10,000 gold or 2,000 gold instead of 750 (choose one)

economy.name: Daily Merchant Refresh
economy.desc: Merchant's gold/inventory refreshes every day instead of every 2 days

economy.name: Cutthroat Merchants
economy.desc: Get less gold when selling items. Pay more gold when buying items. Choose from 4 versions. (see image)

economy.name: Harder Trading with Sell Cap
economy.desc: Uses sell caps (instead of barter ratios) to decrease loot value. Aims to to increase significance of quests/jobs. (see image)

economy.name: Bounty Gold
economy.desc: Allows player to adjust gold reward amount for bounty quests through the MCM.

economy.name: Reduced Gold Rewards for Quests
economy.desc: Drastically reduces the amount of gold you receive from quests. e.g. a simple "fetch quest" pays 20 - 40 gold (instead of 250 gold).

economy.name: Increased Bounty and Guild Rewards
economy.desc: Bounty rewards & Guild rewards are based on your level (e.g. bounty = 30 x level) instead of a fixed amt. (3 versions - low, med & high)

economy.name: Item Rewards For Bounties - WG
economy.desc: Receive a random leveled item for bounties plus 250 Gold for Bandits & Forsworn, 500 for Giants & 750 for Dragons

economy.name: Your Market Stall
economy.desc: \[SKSE\] Lets you open a fleamarket stall and sell merchandise to NPCs (Try [Adura's Merchant Mod - Player Shops](http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=116775764) on Steam as an alternative)

economy.name: Storefront
economy.desc: \[HF\] Your spouse will operate a store in the market area of the city you are living in during the day. Place objects in chest to be sold.

economy.name: RE - Real Estate
economy.desc: \[SKSE\] Become a landlord by purchasing and renting properties like houses, shops, inns, farms and more. Earn weekly revenue from your properties. (Also consider [Skyrim Tycoon - Reloaded](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34959/)

economy.name: Bordeciel Bank Mod (BBM)
economy.desc: Adds a bank in Whiterun. Buy properties, titles, money, personal safe or chest, exchange gold for certificate, and more.

magic.name: Apocalypse - Magic of Skyrim
magic.desc: 50K+ endorsements. Adds 140 unique, balanced and lore friendly spells that increase the depth and skill cap of playing a magic user while blending in with the existing magic system. Spells and scrolls are added to existing spell vendors and loot lists.

magic.name: Phenderix Magic Evolved
magic.desc: Adds 300+ spells. Numerous archetypes.

magic.name: Forgotten Magic Redone
magic.desc: \[SKSE\] Adds 38+ spells, each with 10 possible improvements. Spells improve with use. Click video link for brief summary or [click here](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5dIAQalEbis&feature=share&list=UUL2K7f0op7vyj-wFzeuSjGQ&index=2) for an indepth video review.

magic.name: Spell Crafting for Skyrim
magic.desc: \[SKSE\] Create, save and name your own custom spells by combining up to 5 different magic effects (over 40 to choose from). Vary the duration, target type, amt of damage, level of targets affected, etc. (thousands of possible combinations)

magic.name: Spell Combos
magic.desc: Allows you to trigger different effects (explosion, stat debuffs, push, disarm, etc.) when casting different spell combinations in combat. e.g. Ice Spike + Sparks = Superconductor combo.

magic.name: Tomes - Immersive Spell Learning
magic.desc: Prevents learning new spells until gaining the appropriate perk for that school of magic. Player stars with no spells.

magic.name: Autodidact Wizard
magic.desc: A new approach to learning spells. Learn primarily through practice and teachers.

magic.name: Battlemages Arcane - Tactical Spellcasting
magic.desc: Extends gameplay with new spell options & strategies to overcome difficult odds without being overpowered

magic.name: Balanced Magic
magic.desc: Makes numerous changes to magic that makes playing a straight mage character possible without being overpowered. Works well but no longer supported. Works with DawnGuard but new DG spells aren't supported.

magic.name: Better Magic
magic.desc: Progression in mastery of any spell in a school of magic increases duration or magnitude of all spells in that school. Better magic armor. Dual-casting costs less. Better spell finishers. Improved Master spells, more... (Designed to be compatible with other spell mods)

magic.name: Empowered Magic
magic.desc: Overhaul of Magic Perk Trees + Magicka regen in combat = 50% (from 33%). Magic skills don't decrease spell cost, they increase magnitude instead.

magic.name: Skyrim Improved Magic System
magic.desc: Magic overhaul - more spells, skill perks overhaul, scroll version of all spells, integration with Vanilla spells.

magic.name: Mastered Magicka
magic.desc: Spell power scales based on how many points you've invested in Magicka and what perks you have in Spell School skills. Compatible with [Balanced Magic](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2275) and [Midas Magic](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3413) (partially)

magic.name: Mighty Magick Skyrim
magic.desc: \[SKSE\] A modular collection of ESPs that improve magic with minimal conflict with other mods

magic.name: Better Wards
magic.desc: Rebalances wards - costs less to cast, reduces charge time in half, and follows a linear increase in strength when leveling. (Affects NPC wards, too).

magic.name: Simple Magic Rebalance
magic.desc: \[DG\] \[DB\] Effects from potions and enchantments are swapped: enchanted gear increases spell power and potions reduce casting costs.

magic.name: Auto Magic Scaling
magic.desc: Scales the players magic values by modifying the <School>PowerMod actor variables. Highly configurable

magic.name: Armor Affects Magic
magic.desc: Each piece of Heavy Armor worn increases casting cost of spells by 20% (Each piece of Light Armor increases cost by 5%/piece). Wearing no armor gives a 10-20% bonus.

magic.name: Spell Eraser
magic.desc: Adds a power that lets you remove spells from your character.

magic.name: Invested Magic - A Better Magic Paradigm
magic.desc: Makes certain spells permanent until turned off (e.g. armor, light, waterbreathing, summoned creatures, etc)

magic.name: Increased Spell and Power Durations
magic.desc: Offers five duration options each for Candelight, Magelight, Night Eye, Mage Flesh and Cloak spells/scrolls. Made Candelight a Power so you don't have to equip it to cast.

magic.name: Longer Candlelight Spell
magic.desc: Makes Candlelight spell last longer (choose 2-minute, 5-minute or 10-minute version)

magic.name: Spell Lumen
magic.desc: Creates a hovering light that lasts as long as the spell is cast (i.e. disappears when you stop holding the button) Novice alteration spell.

magic.name: Knock - An Open Lock Spell
magic.desc: Allows you to unlock any locked object that has a lock level lower than your Alteration skill (or try [Leazers Open Lock 2\_0](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36897/)).

magic.name: Magic DuelMagic Duel: Reborn
magic.desc: \[SKSE\] Allows player to duel against another mage using destruction spells. (Alternate pressing mouse buttons to win) Many configurable options (difficulty, damage, speed, chance of duel & more)

combat.desc:
A standalone module of the ACE - Combat Skills mod that enhances combat. (compatible with all combat mods)

1.  Applies situational combat modifiers (e.g. chance to stagger or knockdown, chance to do extra dmg, adjusted % to hit critically) depending on:
    1.  **Target's Stance** - sleeping, prone, standing, walking, running or sprinting
    2.  **Target's Apparel** - clothes, light armor, heavy armor
    3.  **Angle of Attack** - front, side, rear
2.  Bows: +7% Dmg when not moving | +15% zoom when crouching/sneaking | +15% Dmg at point-blank range
3.  While holding a torch: 1) Cannot sneak 2) Fire attacks do extra Dmg 3) Frost attacks do less Dmg
4.  Move slower when weapon is drawn (optional)
5.  Stamina Regen Rate & Move Speed are reduced when health or stamina is low. (optional)

combat.name: Duel - Combat Realism
combat.desc: Duel Hardcore v7 = fast paced combat where initiative is a key component. Duel v5 = longer fights where timing block and attack opportunities are key components. Armor more effective, weapons parry better, higher dmg, MUCH higher arrow dmg, shorter attack range, slower health regen, faster Stamina regen, timed blocking = less stamina loss, many ways to stagger or knock down opponent but w/ quicker recovery, MUCH smarter NPC AI (teamwork AI)

combat.name: Deadly Combat
combat.desc: Armor less effective, slower health regen, blocking more effective, higher dmg, locational dmg, shorter attack range, actions lose stamina faster but regen faster, timed blocking = less stamina loss, opponents "stagger" when hit, Smarter NPC AI,

combat.name: Ultimate Combat
combat.desc: \[SKSE\] Improves enemy AI, adds new special attacks with animations, NPCs use timed blocks + dodge more. stagger resistance with diminishing effectiveness, higher stamina cost but faster regen rate (configurable), headshots+much more.

combat.name: Duke Patricks - Archery And Heavy Weapons Combat
combat.desc: \[SKSE\] A real-time melee combat simulation mod with re-optimized scripts (faster). Player customizable. Attack range based on 3D weapon model. Real physics weapons speeds. Linear and rotation momentum increases dmg (including horse combat). Locational damage. Realistic ???knockback??? physics. Realistic stamina burn from blocking and attacking based on physics. Timed blocking, feint attacks, evasive ducking and block attacks. Actors show pain. More immersive kill move events. Realistic bow sway, arrow knocking and string pull.

combat.name: Action Combat
combat.desc: \[SKSE\] Use with most other combat mods. Adds Weapon Parrying, Counter-Striking, Pain Reaction, Exhaustion, Vulnerability and a Poise system to combat.

combat.name: Combat Evolved
combat.desc: Use with any other combat mod. Script free. Aims to increase difficulty by making NPCs smarter and more aggressive.

combat.name: Enemy AI OverHaul---Revenge Of the Enemies
combat.desc: \[DG\] Works with all combat mods. Safe to add/remove at any time. Enemies will use their daily racial abilites, a greater variety of spells, dual wield, block more, dodge more, use more power attacks, etc.

combat.name: Enhanced Enemy AI
combat.desc: Improves enemy combat AI. They will use bash, wards, strikes and spells more often and more effectively. Works well with other combat mods.

combat.name: Skills-based Damage and Magnitude Multipliers
combat.desc: An elegant solution to keep combat challenging at higher levels - adds a sliding damage multiplier for NPCs and/or player based on the current 1H, 2H, Marksman or Destruction Magic skill. i.e. an enemy's bow attack is increased by 20% when their Marksman skill is 20, by 80% at skill 80, etc. Choose a multiplier of x2, x3, x4 or x5

combat.name: Realistic Ragdolls and Force
combat.desc: 50K+ endorsements. Makes characters react more realistically to impacts.

combat.name: NpcHavokHit
combat.desc: Adds body impact physics to NPCs i.e. head moves when taking a blow to the head. (Not compatible with Realistic Ragdolls and Force)

combat.name: TK HitStop
combat.desc: \[SKSE\] Adds 3 visual effects when hitting someone ("hit-stop"," shake camera" and "blur effect") to enhance the illusion of actually hitting them. (watch video) Player customizable.

combat.name: TKDodge
combat.desc: \[SKSE\] Player can Dodge (new animations) left/right/back using double tap or ALT + A S or D. Works with Deadly Combat.

combat.name: Dodge Mod
combat.desc: \[SKSE\] Allows player to make short, quick movements to dodge opponents' attacks. By default, uses sprint key while moving sideways or backwards. Plays animation.

combat.name: Locational Damage
combat.desc: \[SKSE\] \*\* Caution: Over long term saves, this mod can can result in a build-up resulting in script latency, slower processing and eventually enemies reacting improperly or CTDs ([source](http://steamcommunity.com/app/72850/discussions/0/523890681422555089/)) \*\* Adds 15 different body zones, each with unique critical hit effects (e.g. staggering, knockback, knockdown, blurred vision...). Percentaged dmg for head, chest & leg area. Works with other combat mods. Customizable. (Not compatible with Player Headtracking)

combat.name: Battle fatigue and injuries
combat.desc: \[SKSE\] Losing 25% Health at once causes an injury (Subtle screen blur). Each injury reduces specific skills depending on location of injury. Injuries can accumulate. Bandages reduce injury effects by half for 12 hrs (treating an injury takes 15 minutes). Sleeping heals injuries. Animations. (also consider [Linen Craft](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21394/)) and/or [Bandages - a Battle Fatigue and Injuries patch](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54644/) for bandage making.

combat.name: Injure Kit
combat.desc: Adds playable arm bandage, head bandage, cuffs & shoe wraps that increase health regeneration by 5% each (cumulative). Craftable at tanning rack using leather strips.

combat.name: First Aid
combat.desc: Apply bandages after battle to heal. (Add alcohol to bandage to cure disease). Adds penalties and restrictions as Player's Health gets lower. (also consider [Linen Craft](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21394/))

combat.name: Pseudo parry animation
combat.desc: Adds more realistic parrying animations

combat.name: Dual Wield Parrying
combat.desc: \[SKSE\] Allows parrying & blocking while dual-wielding two weapons.

combat.name: Dual Wield Blocking Animations
combat.desc: Adds a blocking animation for Duel Wield Parrying.

combat.name: Sweeping Weapons
combat.desc: Makes it possible to hit multiple opponents with one-handed and two-handed weapons. Compatible with the 3 big combat mods.

combat.name: Throwing Weapons - Death From Afar
combat.desc: Throw Axes, Knives, Javelins, Potions, Grenades, Torches and more.

combat.name: Throwing Knives WIP
combat.desc: Adds throwing knives and axes to the Skyrim armory.

combat.name: Kick Bash
combat.desc: Adds several kick attacks. (Replaces bash animation with a variety of kick animations)

combat.name: Grandmaster - True Unarmed and Unarmored Combat
combat.desc: Adds unarmed combat moves + optional perks that add magic (chi) to attacks

combat.name: Way of the Monk - Unarmed Overhaul
combat.desc: Play as a monk (unarmed combat) - adds 2 new skills, weapons, clothing & armor, perks, enchantments, enemies, & locations to the game.

combat.name: Handyman
combat.desc: Lets you attack enemies with basic tools and household items (e.g. pitchfork, shovel, broom, etc)

combat.name: Dynamic Difficulty
combat.desc: \[SKSE\] Modifiers to damage dealt and damage received can be set to a static amount or allowed to adjust dynamically based on length of battles to keep game challenging. (Player configurable)

combat.name: Custom Difficulty
combat.desc: Allows the game difficulty slider to modify dmg received (e.g. .75x, 1x, 2x, 3x) while keeping the modifier for damage dealt constant (choose between .75x, 1x, 1.25x, 1.5x)

combat.name: Phenderix Tool - Edit Weapon
combat.desc: \[SKSE\] Adjust the Base Damage, Speed, Stagger Chance, Max Range or Reach of any weapon using a spell.

combat.name: VioLens - A Killmove Mod
combat.desc: \[SKSE\] Successor to The Dance of Death, VioLens gives you in-game control over both ranged and melee killmoves. Version 2.0+ provides more Killmove customization by allowing you to pick which Killmoves you'd like to see trigger for each weapon type.

combat.name: The Dance of Death - A Killmove Mod
combat.desc: \[SKSE\] \*\* No longer supported. Author recommends using [VioLens - A Killmove Mod](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56980/) instead \*\* Adds many new kill moves.

combat.name: Heart Breaker - A Killmove Mod
combat.desc: \[DB\] Press "E" while humanoid opponent is on one knee to rip their heart out. Compatible with Dance of Death and Violens.

combat.name: Disable slow motion for killmoves and forced killcam
combat.desc: If you're playing in 3rd person, your killmove will be in real time 3rd person. If you're in 1st person, your killmove will be in real time 1st person.

combat.name: 3rd Person Finishers only
combat.desc: Finishing moves will be in 3rd person view if playing if 3rd person view. (Does not affect slow motion).... or try [1st Person Finishers Only](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39640//)

combat.name: Enhanced Blood Textures
combat.desc: 100K+ endorsements. Adds features such as decapitated spasms, blood drops when low health, blood pools, blood appears where hit. A bloodier combat experience with higher resolution and detailed textures.

combat.name: Bloody Facials
combat.desc: Adds a chance of you or an NPC's face being spattered with blood during combat.

combat.name: Bloody Facials REBLOODED
combat.desc: Adds a chance of you or an NPC's face being spattered with blood during combat. Last 1-10 minutes. Can wash off with water.

archery.name: Archery Gameplay Overhaul
archery.desc: Improves animations. Faster reloading, Adds enchanted arrows. Arrows cause bleeding. Improved bow shake. Arm fatigue. Impaled arrows don't disappear. Enhanced camera options and much more. Configurable through MCM.

archery.name: ABT - Arrows and Bolts Tweaks
archery.desc: Offers numerous tweaks for arrows & bolts (many choices) - speed, varied dmg by arrow type, increased dmg options, arrow recovery chances, arrows from loot, arrow from merchant, more. Also includes ini edits to make arrows properly hit where the crosshair is aiming, to make arrows fly farther, and to reduce "aim assist" (arrows still hit if it's a near miss) (Compatible with ACE Archery Module)

archery.name: ACE Archery Module
archery.desc:
Makes long bows and Light bows very different:

*   **Long Bows**: Heavy, high dmg, fire loudly and slowly, ignore armor. Zoom 30% more than light bows while crouching, great for sniping. Higher arrow speed with more range. Sneak penalty while equipped (optional).
*   **Light Bows**: Lower dmg, fire fast & silently, strong criticals, great sneak attacks - 2x attack speed of long bows. 4x sneak attack bonus (6x with deadly aim). Higher bonus for critical damage than long bows.

Adds Regular vs Worn arrows. Craft 5 regular arrows from 10 Worn arrows. NPCs properly use their ammo stock. Many changes to Archery perks. Bonus if bow type matches arrow type (optional). Penalty if bow type doesn't match arrow type (optional). Compatible with ABT - Arrows and Bolt Tweaks

archery.name: Difficult Archery
archery.desc: Decreases accuracy of NPC's ranged attacks so they won't always hit you. Choose from four levels of accuracy. Works well with mods that increase arrow damage. (Not needed if using Requiem).

archery.name: Nock to Tip
archery.desc: Adds new fletching system for crafting arrows and a new restringing system to upgrade bows. Adds new crafting benches. Makes arrows penetrate further and spin in flight. Improves quivers. Adds new perks and more.

archery.name: Manual Crossbow Reload
archery.desc: Allows player to control when crossbow is reloaded after firing instead of reloading automatically.

archery.name: TK Recoil
archery.desc: Adds a recoil effect when shooting a bow, crossbow or staff spell. Highly configurable.

archery.name: Immersive Archery
archery.desc: Causes bow to shake slightly (configurable) depending on skill level, power of bow, and stamina. The longer you hold, the more you will shake.

archery.name: Ultimate Spinning Arrows
archery.desc: Makes arrows spin realistically in flight. Most obvious during kill cam.

archery.name: Arrow Recovery System Overhaul
archery.desc: Arrows won't disappear. Arrows can break and be repaired. Configurable chance of breakage. Adds optional automatic arrow retrieval. Compatible with all arrow mods.

archery.name: NPCs Use Ammo
archery.desc: NPCs use up their arrow stocks during a fight

archery.name: Closer Quivers and Longer Arrows
archery.desc: Moves your character's quiver closer to their body so they are no longer floating in mid-air. Also makes arrows longer to more closely match real-world length. Also recommend installing "Fixed Arrow Recovery", an optional plugin in the Downloads section - Fixes arrows so they can be grabbed correctly from objects.

archery.name: Proper Length Arrows
archery.desc: Improves the length of arrows to more closely match real-world length

archery.name: Private Selective Quivers
archery.desc: Lets you use one quiver for all of your arrows. Only affects player. ([Click here](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7548) to set one quiver for player AND all NPCs)

archery.name: Belt-Fastened Quivers
archery.desc: Repositions quivers to a more backpack-friendly position on the belt behind the player and adds a new arrow-drawing animation.

archery.name: Vanilla Tweaks - Arrow pickup fix
archery.desc: Fixes arrows so they can be grabbed correctly from objects instead of grabbing at empty space. Best used on Vanilla length arrows. Alternative included in [Closer Quivers and Longer Arrows](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5711)

archery.name: Proper Aiming
archery.desc: Makes arrow properly hit where the crosshair is aiming when shooting in 3rd person view.

archery.name: Better archery Eagle Eye perk
archery.desc: Modifies the "Eagle Eye" archery perk so that you have a more powerful zoom and it burns much less stamina.

archery.name: Torch Arrows
archery.desc: Adds torch arrows. Targets will catch on fire and take extended burn damage.

archery.name: Water Arrows And Crossbow Bolts
archery.desc: \[DG\] Adds Thief series style Water Arrows that allow you to extinguish lights from a distance.

archery.name: Elemental Arrows
archery.desc: Adds lesser magic and greater magic arrows. All requires gem arrows as a base plus soul gems. Can be found (rare item) or crafted but requires Alchemy skill level of 25 and the Arcane Blacksmith perk to craft.

weapons_armor.name: Loot and Degradation
weapons_armor.desc: Adds a chance to find tempered ('Fine' to 'Legendary') or enchanted equipment in loot. Causes weapon and armor quality to degrade with use requiring repair and maintenance. Works with custom weapon/armor mods

weapons_armor.name: Weapons and Armor Degradation and Repair
weapons_armor.desc: Adds a chance to find tempered ('Fine' to 'Legendary') or enchanted equipment in loot. Causes weapon and armor quality to degrade with use requiring repair and maintenance. Works with custom weapon/armor mods. \*\* NOTE: Per the author, this must be dead last in your load order to function properly \*\*

weapons_armor.name: Immersive Weapons
weapons_armor.desc: 100K+ endorsements. A weapons mod compilation adding over 200 high-quality, lore-friendly weapons. Includes Weapons of the Third Era. Does not include JaySuS Swords. All are craftable, upgradable, enchantable and integrated into the game through leveled lists, vendors, placement in dungeons and/or onto specific people.

weapons_armor.name: JaySuS Swords
weapons_armor.desc:
50K+ endorsements. Adds 51 highly detailed, lore-friendly, craftable weapons (mostly steel). \*\* Install with [Sharlikran's Compatibility Patch](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26230) as follows: \*\*  
**Step 1:** Install [JaySuS Swords V13C](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1002/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D1002&pUp=1) from jaysus' original mod.  
**Step 2:** Install [JaySuS Swords V13C to V13D Update](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1002/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D1002&pUp=1) from jaysus' original mod.
