**Step 2B:** \*\* Select "NO" when seeing [this message](http://imageshack.us/a/img543/7892/69ih.jpg) to upgrade V13C to V13D or your weapons will be invisible \*\* [read more...](http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/470597-jaysus-swords/?p=20348744)  
**Step 3:** Install [JaySuS\_Swords\_Compatibility\_Patch](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26230/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D26230&pUp=1) from Sharlikran's mod page.

weapons_armor.name: Heavy Armory - New Weapons
weapons_armor.desc: Adds clubs, halberds, spears, glaives, shortswords and quarter staves. Used by bandits, guards, Draugr, Falmer and other npc???s or craftable. Already included in [SkyRE](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9286).

weapons_armor.name: Lost LongSwords
weapons_armor.desc: Adds craftable, upgradeable and enchantable long swords with scabbard. Added to loot lists and merchants.

weapons_armor.name: The Chronicles of Steel -Skyrim- Realswords
weapons_armor.desc: Adds 75 lore-friendly weapons. Cannot be crafted. Worn and Old varieties have been added to loot lists. New versions can be bought from vendors. All have either steel or bronze hilts (Steel = faster/less dmg. Bronze = slower/more dmg). This gives each weapon a unique feel. Also adds custom Blood Shader UV Maps. Works well with Morrowloot.

weapons_armor.name: Immersive Armors
weapons_armor.desc: 100K+ endorsements. Adds 50+ sets of armor sets, hundreds of new shields, plus eye patches, capes, earrings, scarves, and more! Craftable, upgradable, enchantable and added to loot lists. MCM Menu

weapons_armor.name: Omegared99 - Armor Compilation
weapons_armor.desc: Adds detailed, lore-friendly armor and weapons.

weapons_armor.name: Bucklers - Shields and other Armours
weapons_armor.desc: Adds craftable bucklers (~60% the size of a normal shield) and light armour shields.

realism.name: Frostfall - Hypothermia Camping Survival
realism.desc: 50K+ endorsements. [Click here for comparison to Hypothermia](http://youtu.be/QRAa715_fyk) Frostfall is a survival-style mod that adds Cold Weather Survival elements to the game. Adds craftable camping equipment, backpacks, warm clothing and armor and more. Clothing can affect warmth (optional). Choose from 3 realism level presets.

realism.name: Hypothermia
realism.desc: [Click here for comparison to Frostfall](http://youtu.be/QRAa715_fyk) Core body temp drops and rises depending on actions/environment. Includes hand warming animation. [Click here](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61997) for Hypothermia 1.5 patch.

realism.name: Cloaks of Skyrim
realism.desc: Adds cloaks that provide extra warmth for Frostfall mod

realism.name: Winter is coming - Cloaks
realism.desc: Adds thick cloaks that provide extra warmth for Frostfall mod

realism.name: Footprints
realism.desc: Players, NPCs and creatures leave footprints as they walk

realism.name: Get Snowy
realism.desc: Causes snow to lay on clothing of PC and NPCs when snowing

realism.name: Wet and Cold
realism.desc:
**Cold**: When it's cold, everyone's breath is realistically visible. NPCs will equip fur hoods and gloves. NPCs will go home if there's a blizzard. Keep head down during snow or be periodically blinded.  
**Wet:** When wet, water will drip from body parts. When it's raining, NPCs will don rain hoods and go home. Rain temporarily blinds you when looking up.

realism.name: No snow under the roof
realism.desc: Realistically removes some snow from under porches, overhangs, etc. and adds 3D snow to the tops of houses/buildings

realism.name: Real Shelter
realism.desc: Provides shelter from the rain and snow in outdoor areas that have overhead cover. Works with Frostfall and Climates of Tamriel. [Click here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mOs3O5kqOIY) for video tutorial on how to install Real Shelter with Mod Organizer

realism.name: Wonders of Weather
realism.desc: Adds rain splash effects, shooting stars and rainbows. Configurable through MCM.

realism.name: Realistic Boat Bobbing
realism.desc: Makes boats bob realistically in the water.

realism.name: vwr Wet Eyes
realism.desc: Adds a realistic blurring effect while submerged in water and briefly after.

realism.name: Morning Fogs
realism.desc: Adds a mysty fog over water from 4am - 7am at the docks of many towns.

realism.name: Supreme and Volumetric Fog
realism.desc: Same as "Morning Fogs" but also makes foggy weather much foggier

realism.name: Water (The Ruffled Feather - Mod Collection)
realism.desc: [Watch comparison video](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BiNSRXwliYU&feature=youtu.be&t=8m8s) (Author combined mods into a modular install that includes "Water"). Makes water look and behave more realistically - rivers flow in one direction, ocean waves flow towards coast, water drop ripples, some smaller boats bob in the water, realistic waterfalls, more...

realism.name: Pure Waters
realism.desc: [Watch comparison video](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BiNSRXwliYU&feature=youtu.be&t=8m8s) More realistic looking water with the lowest performance hit of the three water mods. (already included with [Purity](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65242/))

realism.name: Realistic Water Two
realism.desc: [Watch comparison video](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BiNSRXwliYU&feature=youtu.be&t=8m8s) Separates lakes, ponds, rivers and ocean waters to give each water type its own unique colors, textures, water motions, and ambient sound effects. Waterfalls flow faster and water is louder where appropriate. Makes some boats, including long boats, bob in the water. Also consider [Realistic Water Two - stream Fix](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68502/). [Click here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-HrPpuvK-Lc) for installation walk-thru video. [Click here](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u1NzoBsa66g) for a comparison to Pure Waters.

realism.name: Fire and Ice Overhaul
realism.desc: Fire magic makes objects catch on fire and the fire will spread to nearby flammable objects. Extinguish fires with frost spells. Use Frost spell to create walls of ice.

realism.name: Burn Freeze Shock Effects
realism.desc: Applies realistic fire, ice and shock spell effects i.e. burnt/frosted/calcinated skin, charred or frozen bodies, etc.

realism.name: Dynamic Fires
realism.desc: Adds ability to light fires with torch or fire spell and extinguish fires with the frost spell (Note: [Frostfall](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11163) lets you light fires with a torch.) \*\* Not compatible with Frostfall 2.5+ \*\*

realism.name: Fires Hurt
realism.desc: Standing in fire will burn the player. Also consider [Hot Volcanic Water](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21889) (boiling geysers hurt)

realism.name: Smoking Torches and Candles
realism.desc: Makes torches and candles give off smoke

realism.name: Chimneys for Skyrim
realism.desc: Adds chimneys with chimney smoke to villager's homes in 5+ locations.

realism.name: Woodcutter
realism.desc: \[SKSE\] \[DG+HF+DB\] Use an axe to cut down any tree (you can actually watch it fall!). Also lets you craft saw horses and new work benches which will let you craft countless items including tents, barricades, furniture, clutter items, vanilla crafting stations, a new scriptorium to duplicate books and scrolls, light sources, and much much more. Requires [Jaxonz Positioner](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52583/) to place and position the items you craft.

realism.name: collecting Firewood
realism.desc: Gives you the ability to collect firewood instead of chopping it.

realism.name: Dynamic Things - Woodpiles and Barrels...
realism.desc:
\[SKSE\] \*\* Highly recommend also installing the patch [Dynamic Things - Enhanced](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54116) to fix bugs and enhance compatibility ([Read More](http://steamcommunity.com/app/72850/discussions/0/523890681422555089/))\*\*

*   Convert any container into a "safe-storage" container by simply putting something into it. (Make any house/cave/fort into a player home)
*   All keg barrels are functional - contain mead/water/blood/etc. Payment required first. Fill empty bottles.
*   Lets you harvest firewood/deadwood from bushes/trees/woodpiles/fallen trees/driftwood, etc. Can chop down trees.
*   Makes all barrels/crates into active containers with "intelligent" ingredients.
*   Using a training dummy/archery target will increase appropriate skill

realism.name: Earthquakes
realism.desc: Adds earthquake events during the game. MCM customizable. Safe and compatible with any mod.

realism.name: Static Mesh Improvement Mod - SMIM
realism.desc: 100K+ endorsements. Makes barrel lids and drawers move realistically when checking their contents plus improves mesh on many objects.

realism.name: Dead Body Collision Fix
realism.desc: Makes dead bodies solid so you can collide with, stand on or stack any corpse including dragons, mammoths, etc.

realism.name: Skyrim Hair Physics Project
realism.desc: Makes hair move realistically

realism.name: Flowing Cape With Physics
realism.desc: \[DG\] Adds a cape with realistic physics

realism.name: Waves
realism.desc: \[DB\] Makes waves appear along the Coast

realism.name: CP Apple Trees
realism.desc: Adds harvestable apple trees around Skyrim with Havok physics-enabled apples - pluck by hand or shoot off of tree with an arrow.

realism.name: A Place to Sleep
realism.desc: Adds or modifies sleepable surfaces at locations around the world

realism.name: Go to bed
realism.desc: \[SKSE\] The current, recommended, safe-to-use Nexus mod that will show an animation of player going to sleep and waking up. Compatible with everything. Does not attach scripts to beds.

realism.name: Another Sleep Mod
realism.desc: \[SKSE\] Shows animation of player going to sleep and waking up. This mod has no issues with eyes remaining closed after waking up. (alternate download location provided in description)

realism.name: Sleep Tight
realism.desc: Changes sleepwear of sleeping NPCs and followers, adds snoring sound (optional), adds damage multiplier when attacking sleeping NPCs (optional), more...

realism.name: Alcohol Drunk Effect
realism.desc: Adds 3rd person drinking animation, animated stumble and visual blur effect when alcoholic drinks are consumed.

realism.name: Get Drunk
realism.desc: Adds progressively worse radial blur, distortion, stumbling, and other inebriation effects after consuming Nord Mead, Alto Wine, Spiced Wine, and many other alcoholic beverages

realism.name: Katixas Refillable Potions
realism.desc: Makes Stamina, Magicka and Healing potions refillable at Alchemist shops

realism.name: Collect water from wells
realism.desc: Use wells in Vanilla towns, markets and forts to fill empty waterskins/bottles with spring water. Compatible with Realistic Needs and Diseases

realism.name: Drinking Fountains of Skyrim
realism.desc: Adds several drinking fountains around Skyrim. Activating a fountain will give you three bottles of water. If in 3rd person, an animation will play. (Click [here](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34010) for Dragonborn expansion)

realism.name: Katixas Usable Barrels
realism.desc: Makes almost all barrels around the world usable (inns, dungeons, forts, etc.) (Gives back an empty bottle when done drinking it)

realism.name: Skooma Drug Effect
realism.desc: Adds drugged effect (see video). (Optional file - effect only in 1st person view)

realism.name: Player Headtracking
realism.desc: \[SKSE\] Your character will automatically turn his/her head to focus on other actors appropriately... similar to how NPC's behave in the game.

realism.name: HeadTrack Crosshair
realism.desc: \[SKSE\] Makes your character look at any activatable object that you are aiming at with the crosshair. Works with [Player Headtracking](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23600/).

realism.name: NoMaaM Breathing Idles BBB
realism.desc: Adds a realistic breathing motion to the standard idle animation

realism.name: Syynxs Lowered Hands
realism.desc: Removes empty fist from view in 1st person (idle fist is lowered off of the screen)

realism.name: Lower 1st Person Weapons - change weapon height
realism.desc: Lowers your weapons in first person mode. Makes weapons less intrusive, especially for dual wielding.

realism.name: Skyrim Heart Rate
realism.desc: Heart rate affects stamina regeneration. Long term stamina affects speed. Resting serves a real purpose.

realism.name: Pumping Iron - Dynamic Muscle Growth
realism.desc: \[SKSE\] Character's weight (size) increases over time. Increases in combat skills will increase weight. Changes apply after sleeping well. Can track progress. Reach max weight around level 40 - 50.

realism.name: Five O Clock Shadow
realism.desc: \[SKSE\] Your character's beard and, optionally, your followers' beards will grow over time Can use a razor in inventory to trim your beard. Set growth rate in MCM.

realism.name: Improved Weapon Impact EFFECTS Correct Metal
realism.desc: Hitting metal or stone with your weapon will create sparks (see video for Before & After)

realism.name: Equipping Overhaul
realism.desc: \[SKSE\] An improved version of [Armed to the Teeth - easy version](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26486) - all favorited weapons are visible on your character, current weapon or torch drops to the ground when fast-drawing a different weapon (optional), and torches stay lit when dropped. Compatible with Dual Sheath Redux.

realism.name: All Geared Up
realism.desc: \[SKSE\] Displays favorited weapons and shields on the character when not equipped.

realism.name: Dual Sheath Redux
realism.desc: \[SKSE\] Places staves and shield on back when weapons are sheathed. Shows both left and right-handed weapons as sheathed when dual-wielding. Compatible with [Equipping Overhaul](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49784/). [Installation instruction video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Z2KmriJCxQg)

realism.name: Greatsword sheaths and scabbards
realism.desc: Adds scabbards for 2-handed Greatswords on your back (instead of swords floating on your back)

realism.name: Fully Animated Meals Potions
realism.desc: Adds accurate eating and drinking animations for potions, meads, wines, ales, soups, cheeses, stews, sweetrolls, apples cooked beef, venison, chicken, pheasant, rabbit, horker and more. Not compatible with Realistic Needs and Diseases. Requires [FNIS](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11811/). [Click here](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26996/) for compatibility patches - Realistic Needs & Diseases & Imp's Complex Needs.

realism.name: Eating and Drinking animations (looping-free)
realism.desc: Plays brief animation of drinking or eating bread. No action needed to stop animation (only lasts a few seconds)

realism.name: Dine with Followers
realism.desc: \[SKSE\] Followers will sit and eat with you.

realism.name: Better Breath Holding
realism.desc: Lengthens the time your character can hold their breath underwater.

realism.name: Cavern Pitfalls WIP
realism.desc: Adds pitfalls to some of the Caverns that have open sky lights

realism.name: Bring Out Your Dead
realism.desc: Adds immersion by expanding the # of graves given to unique PCs

realism.name: Open Cities Skyrim
realism.desc: \[DG+HF\] Allows player to enter and leave the 5 cities without a loading screen. (Can ride a horse into the city).

roleplaying.name: Familiar Faces
roleplaying.desc: Lets you import your previous characters into your current game and play with them as your followers. Lets you save each character to a ''Shrine of Heroes'.

roleplaying.name: Professions
roleplaying.desc:
1.  \[SKSE\] Makes game time pass (player-configurable) when crafting, cooking, enchanting, mining, woodchopping, etc. Solves the problem of leveling too quickly from rapidly crafting 20 potions/daggers and having too much money from selling crafted items. Works best with a basic needs mod.
2.  Optional feature: Choose from 9 professions and receive bonuses/penalties for doing/not doing work related to your profession. Note: it's beneficial to wear activity-appropriate clothing.

roleplaying.name: Faction: Pit Fighter
roleplaying.desc: Bet on fights or compete in underground pit fights by joining a pit fighter faction. by ThirteenOranges. Also consider [this add-on](http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=125029519).

roleplaying.name: Helgen Reborn
roleplaying.desc: The equivalent of a DLC. Rebuild Helgen from the ground up, train guards to protect it, fight the Thalmor and much more. Fully voiced actors. 4-6 hours of gameplay. [Watch Gopher's full review](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mMesbwZJatg)

roleplaying.name: Become High King of Skyrim V2
roleplaying.desc: (new version being maintained by Harkon121599). Become king through marriage or assassination. Adds NPC interactions with numerous features to appoint, recruit and command subjects while living in a castle.

roleplaying.name: LC-Become King of Riverhelm
roleplaying.desc: Rule a fortress as King. Collect taxes, Generate attacks on castle. Adds 4 Knight followers, coat of arms, 100 NPCs, jester, arena, sewers, baker, , armory, stable with 2 horses.

roleplaying.name: LC_BecomeJarlofIvarstead
roleplaying.desc: Adds a quest to become Jarl. Allows you to rebuild/expand your castle. Mange reputation, taxes, food management, prisons, new buildings, import and export, feasts and events, servants, companions and more.

roleplaying.name: Pirates of Skyrim - The Northern Cardinal under the Black Flag
roleplaying.desc: \[DG + DB\] An expansion to [Northern Cardinal](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54956/) - Own a ship and be a pirate or privateer. Fast travel to various locations. Hire and pay a crew. Board and fight other ships. Sail to the Sea of Ghosts for adventure and treasure. Much more...

roleplaying.name: Heljarchen Farm
roleplaying.desc: \[HF\] Lets you buy, expand and operate a farm. Hire workers, grow crops and earn money selling the harvested crops. Complete renovations to the farmhouse, farm and meadery yourself or hire builders to do the work for you.

roleplaying.name: Windstad Mine
roleplaying.desc: \[HF\] Let's you become the owner of a profitable mining operation. Liberate a mine from bandits, expand it, build a fishery, hire workers, hire guards and more.

roleplaying.name: Millwater Retreat
roleplaying.desc: Restore an old building into your home and customize it. Build a mill and operate your own milling business. No DLCs required.

roleplaying.name: Katixas Ciderhouse Restaurant
roleplaying.desc: Manage a restaurant and make your own cider in a very detailed and realistic manner.

roleplaying.name: Highland Milk Farm
roleplaying.desc: Adds a milk farm & the ability to milk all cows in Skyrim. Adds flour to leveled lists. Farm sells pancakes & omelettes.

roleplaying.name: Katixas Beer Brewery
roleplaying.desc: Brewery sim - realistically brew beer at a new brewery. Each step of the processes is covered in great detail

roleplaying.name: Plant Trees
roleplaying.desc: Enables you to plant seeds that slowly grow into mature trees. Grow your own money-making tree farm.

roleplaying.name: Smash It Up - Functional Mills
roleplaying.desc: Makes GrainMills and WindMills functional. Adds recipes to produce flour, fish oil, bone meal, powdered tusk, fire salts, frost salts, void salts, glow dust and ectoplasm.

roleplaying.name: Whetstones - Immersive Super Nifty and Extremely Portable
roleplaying.desc: Sharpen your bladed weapons at your campsite using a portable whetstone. (Only improve the item half as much as a grindstone) Includes animation.

roleplaying.name: Traders of Skyrim ENG
roleplaying.desc: Makes trading as a career possible - adds 5 merchants selling unique commodities that sell for higher price at other locations. A 2nd mod allows you to buy 9 vanilla shops that generate a high regular income.

roleplaying.name: Calling Card Fence Lite
roleplaying.desc: Adds a fence, Destiny Blaise, to the Bannered Mare who will buy your stolen goods. She also provides 'Calling Cards' to leave on the bodies of those you kill. Can customize .png card.

roleplaying.name: Bards Lute
roleplaying.desc: Activate lute to begin playing 1 of 4 random pieces from the vanilla game for 30 seconds. (puts you in God mode while playing)

roleplaying.name: Sokco's Guild Starter
roleplaying.desc: Lets you create and manage your own guild - Make any location headquarters and recruit any NPC as your guild members. Assign jobs - assassinate, do good deeds, hunt, craft, cook, mine, smuggle skooma, & more. Actions affect reputation of guild. Increase guild levels and earn perks. More. Compatible with all follower mods.

roleplaying.name: Morskom Estate
roleplaying.desc: Lets you purchase a large but bare player home in disarray and then upgrade numerous aspects over time in a realistic and immersive way. Extensive features.

roleplaying.name: Live Anywhere - Constructible Shacks
roleplaying.desc: \[SKSE\] Use menu to easily construct a shack, tent, basement or underground burrow anywhere in the world. Shacks can be open shacks (no load doors) or sheltered (load interiors). Sheltered shacks can be small, large, empty or full. Use menus to reposition, decorate, add stairs, basement, crafting stations and more. Works well with [Guild Starter](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52871/).

roleplaying.name: Build Your Own Home
roleplaying.desc: Allows you to build your own home choosing from a hunter, mage, thief and assassin theme. Many additions and building options. Hearthfire NOT required.

roleplaying.name: Breezehome FullyUpgradable
roleplaying.desc: Adds realistic expansion to breezehome - starts out empty but can be upgraded piece by piece to include all crafting implements through The Jarl's Steward Proventus. (Works with DLCs installed)

roleplaying.name: Home Construction and Decoration
roleplaying.desc: Buy a deed, gather materials and build your home anywhere. Craft furniture and decorate it how you want. Adjust item placement easily with your mouse.

roleplaying.name: The FPI Gallery for Console Decorators
roleplaying.desc: \[DG+HF+DB\] Use the console to decorate your home in-game with over 1700 hand-placeable items from all of the DLCs and many modder's resource packs. Also lets you travel via console to an Ikea-like gallery to view/browse all 1700 items.

roleplaying.name: Buyable Paintings and Pictures - Place Anywhere
roleplaying.desc: Craft frames, buy paintings and then hang them in your home (or anywhere you want)

roleplaying.name: Painting in Skyrim
roleplaying.desc: Lets you paint your own paintings in-game using an easel, brush, paints, etc. Hang paintings anywhere or sell them. Choose from over 100 paintings or use your own images.

roleplaying.name: Placeable Statics - Move Anything
roleplaying.desc: Move, rotate and place furniture and other items wherever you want (from the creator of Buyable Paintings and Pictures). Compatible with [Decorator Assistant](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13586)

roleplaying.name: More Interactive Items - Grab Moveable Statics
roleplaying.desc: Enables grabbing, throwing, pushing, pulling, taking, buying and selling of 87 pre-exisiting moveable static forms including bowls, cups, plates, ewers, bones, logs, pottery, small stone blocks, knives, forks, urn fragments, etc.

roleplaying.name: Art of the Catch
roleplaying.desc: An immersion mod by Chesko (author of Frostfall) that lets you catch fish with a craftable fishing pole. Includes new animations and more.

roleplaying.name: Fishing in Skyrim
roleplaying.desc: Adds working fishing nets & fishing poles (set pole then add meat, bugs or fish from inventory as bait). Use different bait to catch different fish. Chance to find lost relics. Adds a fishing pole vendor. Compatible with "[Improved Fish](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14320)" and [Driveable Boats!!!](http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=88580670)

roleplaying.name: Hunterborn
roleplaying.desc: \[SKSE\] Changes animal loot into a menu-driven system that lets you pick up, field dress, skin, harvest, and butcher. Skinning animals takes time. Adds hunting knives, new alchemy ingredients/effects, and cooking recipes. Patches available for Realistic Needs and Diseases and Frostfall.

roleplaying.name: Hunting in Skyrim
roleplaying.desc: Adds a hunter's guild, hunting quests and animal dens, skinning system, trophy crafting, better hunting prices, new skills & perks (optional) & more. Compatible with [Real Wildlife](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9778).

roleplaying.name: A Hunters Life - Hunting Overhaul
roleplaying.desc: Adds more value to pelts & tusks. Use salt at tanning rack to treat hide (increases value). Make into fine rugs for more profit.

roleplaying.name: Tameable Wolves/Foxes
roleplaying.desc: Tame a wild fox by feeding it a rabbit haunch. Tame a wild wolf by feeding it a venison chop. (watch video)

roleplaying.name: Dice Game in Taverns
roleplaying.desc: Adds an NPC with dice to of each major city. Bet gold to play. Click dice to roll again.

roleplaying.name: Northern Bathhouses
roleplaying.desc: Adds bathhouses to Markarth, Solitude, Morthal, Whiterun, Dawnstar and Riften

roleplaying.name: Enhanced Hotpools
roleplaying.desc: Adds chairs around the hotpool edges that your Dragonborn and followers can sit on and relax.

roleplaying.name: Breezehome Addition - Bathing Area
roleplaying.desc: Adds a bathing area to the player home in Whiterun. Supports followers.

roleplaying.name: Bury The Dead
roleplaying.desc: \[SKSE\] Lets you bury your fallen companion. Leaves a permanent tombstone behind for posterity that you can read.

roleplaying.name: Alternate Actors
roleplaying.desc: \[SKSE\] \*\* Caution \*\* Allows you to assume full control over anyone in the game. Alternate playing as the mage, fighter or thief in your adventure party!

basic_needs.name: Realistic Needs and Diseases
basic_needs.desc: 6 stages of Hunger/Thirst/Fatigue/Inebration. (rate configurable rate). Diseases get progressively worse. Food loot reduced. Food spoilage. Refill water in rivers (boil or risk disease).

basic_needs.name: iNeed - Food Water and Sleep
basic_needs.desc: Simplifies hunger, thirst and sleep needs and adds lots of configurable options e.g. follower needs, horse needs, decreased food availability and more.

basic_needs.name: Imps More Complex Needs
basic_needs.desc: Hyper-realistic hunger/thirst/sleep. Basic mode - manage satiation, calories, hydration & sleep. Complex mode adds protein, nutrients, alcohol, caffeine, mental fatigue, physical fatigue & morale. Running burns calories. Food can spoil (optional), food likes/dislikes that affect morale, food eaten at an inn or by a fire has higher appeal, eating/drinking animations (optional), water bottles, adjustable dynamic timescale. Compatible with many recipe mods.

basic_needs.name: SkyRealism - Feast and Famine
basic_needs.desc: \[SKSE\] New recipes + more complexity (adds yeast + dough). Foods add buffs. Burn up to 4K ml of H20/day. Gain 900ml/drink. Burn up to 7K calories/day. Gain 100-2K calories/meal. Lack of rest lowers HMS regen rate & speed.

basic_needs.name: Drink Eat Sleep Bathe
basic_needs.desc: User-adjustable rates and thresholds for hunger, thirst, tiredness and cleanliness. Hunger affects recovery rate of Health and Magicka. Thirst affects recovery rate of stamina and shout recovery. Being tired retards skill improvement, attack dmg and spell effectivness. Cleanliness affects speechcraft.

basic_needs.name: Bathing in Skyrim
basic_needs.desc: Adds bathing and cleanliness to Skyrim. Not bathing will eventually penalize Speechcraft and disease resistance.

basic_needs.name: Gromits Cooking Recipes - Food - Drink Overhaul
basic_needs.desc: Eating/drinking provide buffs and/or increase regen rate of H/M/S. 4 Ranks of food. Adds 51 recipes.

basic_needs.name: Eat and Sleep
basic_needs.desc: \[SKSE\] Automatically eat/drink from inventory every 6 hours or choose to have a food menu appear when sitting. 15 mins pass when eating. Food spoils at appropriate rates). An option allows for removal of some food in vicinity depending on its location. Adds a waterskin & sleeping blanket. More...

basic_needs.name: I'm a Customer Dammit
basic_needs.desc: \[SKSE\] Saves time by letting you order food at taverns just by clicking on food (15 septims deducted). Also lets you eat cooked foods in world without putting it in inventory first. Compatible with Realistic Needs and Diseases, iNeed and Frostfall.

basic_needs.name: You Hunger
basic_needs.desc: Reduces the amount of food available in game.

camping.name: Campfire - Complete Camping System
camping.desc: Created by Chesko, author of Frostfall. Use kindling and firewood to build interactive campfires of different sizes (cook, sit by, etc). Build interactive tents, tanning racks, etc. Backpacks dynamically display your bed roll, torch, cooking pot, axe, and water skin. Much more...

camping.name: Pocket Campsite
camping.desc: Lets you build an elaborate camp, fortress or even a town. Includes every conceivable camp item plus furnture. Build walls and more.

camping.name: Camping Kit of the Northern Ranger
camping.desc: Create flat terrain tiles. Exact placement options. Can enter tent and setup interior of tent including alchemy table and tanning rack. Can setup traps to catch food. Adds campfire interactions: read, meditate, warm hands, clean weapons, play a lute or flute.

camping.name: Camping Lite
camping.desc: A tent, a fire and a small sitting log that can be installed in a fast efficient way.

camping.name: Craftable and Placeable Havok-enabled Bedrolls
camping.desc: Adds craftable bedrolls from bear and Sabre Cat pelts. Bedroll will tilt, angle, etc. to match the ground beneath and can be repositioned. Great when a tent doesnt make sense (Keep tent on horse and bedroll on person)

traps.name: Traps Make Noise - More Dangerous Traps
traps.desc:
Choose between 2 versions:  
Traps Make Noise.esp - When traps are triggered, nearby enemies will be alerted. Each trap type generates an appropriate degree of "sound".  
Traps Make Noise and Are Dangerous.esp - \[DG\] \[DB\] Same as above but also increases damage done by traps.

traps.name: Killing Traps
traps.desc: Increase the dmg of all traps by 3.8x - simple and to the point (works on all traps)

traps.name: Subliminal Traps
traps.desc: Makes pressure plates and tripwires harder to see

traps.name: Deployable Traps
traps.desc: Adds variety of traps the player can use: bear, oil, barricade, rocks, caltrops, & more (Works with [Sands of Time](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12452))

diseases.name: Diseased - diseases system overhaul
diseases.desc: Makes diseases progress realistically from mild to severe symptoms. Progression or recovery depends on health, rest, medicine, potions and blessings. Alchemy skill and books help diagnose which disease. Adds new medicine recipes that cure specific diseases. Compatible with [Realistic Needs and Diseases](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26228). [Click here](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67973/) to add a craftable potion that can cure the incurable Droops Disease.

diseases.name: Disease Descriptions for the Immersive Adventurer
diseases.desc: Provides improved descriptions of diseases, plus symptoms plus the mechanical game effects while afflicted. Ex: Bone Break Fever is a mild common disease affecting the victim's strength and coordination. Symptoms include high body temperature and chronic weariness. As a result, your Stamina is reduced by 25 points while affected by the disease.

diseases.name: Chicken Soup of Cure Disease
diseases.desc: Cure an illness by eating soup. Resting in bed is optional (roleplay). Adds craftable chicken soup that cures all diseases.

timescale.name: Living Takes Time
timescale.desc: \[SKSE\] Makes game time pass (player-configurable) when crafting, cooking, enchanting, mining, woodchopping, etc. Solves the problem of leveling too quickly from rapidly crafting 20 potions/daggers and having too much money from selling crafted items. Works best with a basic needs mod.

timescale.name: Professions
timescale.desc: \[SKSE\] Makes game time pass (player-configurable) when crafting, cooking, enchanting, mining, woodchopping, etc. Solves the problem of leveling too quickly from rapidly crafting 20 potions/daggers and having too much money from selling crafted items. Works best with a basic needs mod.

timescale.name: Timescales modified
timescale.desc: Choose from a variety of ESPs to set timescale. Sets a static timescale for all activities.

timescale.name: SkyRealism - Time Scale and Travel Speed
timescale.desc: Changes the TimeScale to 6 i.e. 1 second real time = 6 seconds game time. (default is timescale 20 i.e. 1 second real time = 20 seconds game time)

timescale.name: Dynamic TimeScale with Autosave
timescale.desc: Adjusts the games TimeScale dynamically based on the players circumstances. Fully configurable. Can also perform an AutoSave at regular intervals or after certain events.

weather.name: Climates Of Tamriel - Weather - Lighting - Audio
weather.desc: 100K+ endorsements. A weather and lighting overhaul - Adds over 500 weather systems. Includes presets for dungeons, nights, interiors. Optional sounds. (Consider also using [Climates of Tamriel - Weather Patch](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39799/))

weather.name: Pure Weather
weather.desc: A weather and lighting overhaul - adds new weather, lighting, textures and audio. ZERO performance loss. Fewer features and options than Climates of Tamriel but a good alternative.

weather.name: Purity
weather.desc: Same as Pure Weather above except it also combines [Pure Waters](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1111) by the same author.

weather.name: Real Clouds
weather.desc: Adds realistic 3-D volumetric clouds. Reacts to weather. Compatible with weather mods.

weather.name: True Storms - Thunder and Rain Redone
weather.desc: A new and improved alternative to Immersive Skyrim Thunder. Greatly improves rainy/stormy weather. Compatible with nearly all weather mods. Script free (add/remove at any time).

weather.name: Immersive Skyrim Thunder
weather.desc: Adds better rain and thunder sound effects. (or try [Immersive Skyrim Thunder](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1702)) Works with [Lightning during Thunder Storms](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15506). **Not** compatible with [Climates of Tamriel](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17802).

weather.name: Lightning during Thunder Storms
weather.desc: Adds lightning strike effects during rain storms. (Player-configurable options for frequency, distance & more). If using with Climates of Tamriel (recommended), also install [this patch](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25675) by the same author so lightning will strike appropriately with the weather.

weather.name: Supreme Storms
weather.desc: Makes rain storms and snow storms more intense (does not affect normal rain and snow). Reduced distant view and wind buffs. Compatible with all environmental mods like [Climates of Tamriel](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17802) and [RCRN](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1875/)

weather.name: Real Rain
weather.desc: Makes rain denser, more random and more natural looking. Optional file enhances weather transitions and the sounds of rain/thunder.

weather.name: More Snow
weather.desc: Increases amt of snow, wind sounds and/or reduces viewing distance during medium and heavy snow weather. Not compatible with [CoT](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30450/)

weather.name: Enhanced Landscapes - Winter Edition
weather.desc: An optional plugin-in that applies a wintery, snow-covered climate to all of Skyrim. Based on [Skyrim Winter Overhaul (no longer available) with some improvements. Compatible with Frostfall, water mods, lighting mods, and many more. (Not compatible with Climates of Tamriel, Pure Weather, RCRN or other weather overhaul mods)](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8POp0uoJBb8)

lighting.name: Realistic Lighting Overhaul
lighting.desc: [Video - RLO vs ELFX](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Aq-3THKIBEU) No performance decrease at all. Does not use post-processing. Edits over 10,000 light sources to make light function more realistically. Enhances interior and exterior lighting. Fixes shadow striping. Removes interior fog. Spells emit light. Much More. Compatible with Climates of Tamriel.

lighting.name: Enhanced Lights and FX
lighting.desc: [Video - RLO vs ELFX](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Aq-3THKIBEU) Enhances interior lighting to create a more dramatic and realistic mood. Lighting relies more on actual light sources. Adds candle smoke FX and more.

lighting.name: RCRN -- HDR Lighting and Weather Enhancement
lighting.desc: Highly tuned lighting. Weather and lighting sources are dynamically generated. Volumetric fog. Use [RCRN customizer](http://www.themaskedgamer.com/images/nexus/thumb1xa.png) to choose presets and customize. Only small FPS hit (5fps)

lighting.name: Ultra Realistic World Lighting
lighting.desc: Makes the lighting more realistic with zero performance loss. Simple one-click install/uninstall. No external adjustments required.

lighting.name: Immersive Interiors
lighting.desc: WIP - An interior lighting overhaul. Makes windows transparent. Interior spaces will reflect outdoor lighting, weather and sound. (Not compatible with Realistic Lighting Overhaul)

lighting.name: DYNAVISION - Dynamic Depth of Field
lighting.desc: Adds dynamic depth of field to add a cinematic experience

lighting.name: IMAGINATOR - Visual Control Device for Skyrim
lighting.desc: Adds an in-game tool to control visual elements like Brightness, Contrast, Saturation, Sky Brightness, Sunlight Output, Bloom and Tint

lighting.name: Lanterns of Skyrim - All In One
lighting.desc: [Watch comparison video](http://youtu.be/r0XeQqvlZi8) Adds lighting around roads, bridges, villages, settlements, etc. Works best with [RCRN - Realistic Colors & Real Nights](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1875).

lighting.name: Claralux - More and Brighter Lights
lighting.desc: [Watch comparison video](http://youtu.be/r0XeQqvlZi8) Adds lighting around roads, bridges, villages, settlements, etc. Configurable in-game. Works with [Ultra Realistic World Lighting](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13531) and [Realistic Lighting Overhaul](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30450/)

lighting.name: Skyrim - jumping shadows Fix
lighting.desc: A Skyrim.ini tweak to make shadows move more smoothly

torches_lanterns.name: Wearable Lanterns
torches_lanterns.desc: 50K+ endorsements. Adds a craftable, wearable, Travel Lantern that can be hooked onto your belt or carried in your hand. Uses Oil. Also consider [Wearable Lanterns - Lighting Fix](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64125/).

torches_lanterns.name: LOHS - Lanterns on horse saddles
torches_lanterns.desc: Lets you put candle lanterns on horses. Candles are lit automatically depending on the daytime or lit manually by the player. Configurable via MCM.

torches_lanterns.name: True Torches
torches_lanterns.desc: Increases torch light radius from 712 to 762. Increases torch light shadow radius from 512 to 762. Increases torch life time from 4 minutes to 12 minutes

torches_lanterns.name: SM Drop Lit Torches
torches_lanterns.desc: \[SKSE\] Equipped torch will drop to floor when switching to a weapon/spell/shield. NOTE: This feature is included in [Equipping Overhaul](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49784/). (Try [Simple Drop Lit Torches](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56566/) as an alternative)

torches_lanterns.name: Torch Hotkey
torches_lanterns.desc: \[SKSE\] Adds a rebindable torch hotkey to free a vanilla hotkey. Choose a key when first loading the mod.

torches_lanterns.name: Light up the night - People Have Torches
Extinguishable And (Re)lightable Fires
torches_lanterns.desc: As a feature of the [Sneak Tools](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19447) mod, extinguish or light any Vanilla campfire, candle or wall-mounted torch using frost of fire spell or water and fire arrows.

torches_lanterns.name: Double Torch Radius
torches_lanterns.desc: Doubles the torch light radius without adjusting the intensity, color or duration.

torches_lanterns.name: Brighter Torches with Bigger Radius
torches_lanterns.desc: Increases radius of torch light and makes torch light brighter.

torches_lanterns.name: Torch of Everlasting with Dynamic Shadows
torches_lanterns.desc: Torches burn longer, brighter and/or have greater light radius. Optional version casts dynamic shadows. Duration options: 4 min, 10 min or forever. Light radius options: Default, 2x or 4x. Brightness options: Default, 1.5x or 2x.

torches_lanterns.name: Torches for Skyrim
torches_lanterns.desc: NPCs use them more, more common in loot, higher light radius

torches_lanterns.name: Lanterns and Candles
torches_lanterns.desc: Adds place-able lanterns and candles that can be crafted at a forge. Drop from inventory, activate to lock in place then activate again to turn flame on/off.

torches_lanterns.name: Usable Lantern
torches_lanterns.desc: Adds a lantern you can use to light up areas. Often used in conjunction with with Better Wieldable Lantern.

torches_lanterns.name: Better Wieldable Lantern
torches_lanterns.desc: Adds craftable lanterns. Often used in conjunction with Usable Lantern.

speed.name: Realistic Humanoid Movement Speed
speed.desc: Adjusts the speeds of the player, NPCs and horses (optional) to give a more realistic feel (much faster walk speed, slightly slower run speeds) while maintaining a good game flow. Matches speed of NPCs to the player. Watch video!

speed.name: Realistic Running Speed
speed.desc: Adjusts the speeds of the player, NPCs and horses to give a more realistic feel (generally about 20% slower) while maintaining a good game flow. Matches speed of NPCs to the player.

speed.name: Skyrim Speeds - walk run sprint horses werewolves
speed.desc:
People = 75% faster walk. Horses = 50% faster walk and 25% faster sprint. Use with [Same Walk and Run Speeds](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9553) to match speed of NPCs to player.  
\*\* Install "**Skyrim Speeds**" app from this mod's download section to auto-generate a mod with your own custom speed preferences.

speed.name: Speed Revised V2
speed.desc: People = faster walk and sprint, slower run. Horses = faster walk, run and sprint. Also matches the speeds of NPCs to the player. (see image for speed values)

speed.name: Same Walk and Run Speeds
speed.desc: Makes NPCs walk at same speed as PC. Recommended if using a mod that changes vanilla walk speed.

horses.name: Convenient Horses
horses.desc: \[SKSE\] 50K+ endorsements. 17+ features (too many to list) with many customizable options (WATCH [THIS VIDEO](http://youtu.be/Y4JOb_mH6vk)). Try [Immersive Horses](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64067) as an alternative.

horses.name: Horse commands
horses.desc: \[SKSE\] Adds saddlebags, horse encumbrance (adjustable), commands, improved horse AI (stay or follow intelligently), lets followers ride and more.

horses.name: Aeonbarr - Unique Horse
horses.desc: Adds a highly customizable horse - Choose attributes, appearance, armor type, etc. Compatible with Convenient Horses.

horses.name: Like a Boss - New Mounts Mod
horses.desc: Adds 8 new unique mounts that you can ride like a horse - a wolf, a moose, a polar bear, a mammoth, a dragon (does not fly), a dracolich (does not fly), a giant spider and a walrus. (or click [here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0Uv3Cm2ZSD0#t=6m31s) to ride a Yakkuru)

horses.name: (10 Mount Mods)
horses.desc: A video showcasing a variety of mount mods - [Blaze Of Eventide](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25097/), [Armored SabreCat Mount](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8978/), [Unicorn](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13606/), [Sethai and Elthrai](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38548/), [Skeleton Demonic Horse](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14596/), [Siphan](http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=100832083), [Skeletal Sva??ilfari](http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=100094559), and [Thunderdash](http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=94781580)

horses.name: Convenient Horse Herding
horses.desc: \[SKSE\] An extension of [Convenient Horses](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14950) - Manage your own herd of horses. Rename, set herd camp, have herd follow you, buy guardian dogs to protect your herd, more.

horses.name: Horse Branding
horses.desc: Adds 3 branding irons which let you mark any horse as belonging to you or your followers. Recommended by Ultimate Follower Overhaul

horses.name: Horse Trotting instead of Walking
horses.desc: Replaces the horse walk animation with a horse trot animation and increases the "walk" speed.

horses.name: Oblivious Horses
horses.desc: Horses won't attack, won't be attacked and will only run a short distance away when near danger. Optional: make horse essential, have more stamina and/or faster20% faster. (NOTE: This feature is included in [Convenient Horses](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14950))

horses.name: Horse Whisper --- Horse Calling - Horse Locating
horses.desc: (or try [Whistle](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36701/)) Adds word of power to "Call" your horse (RUNS to player) or "Track and Call" (adds horse as Misc quest + sets quest as active so horse can be seen on map).

horses.name: Horse Fast Dismount
horses.desc: Allows you to dismount your horse instantly. (NOTE: This feature already included in Convenient Horses)

horses.name: More Saddles
horses.desc: A variety of saddles for your horse (purchased at stables) that realistically depict your horse carrying a lot of equipment (see video)

horses.name: Horse Armors for Skyrim
horses.desc: Replaces each city's buyable player horse with a unique armored horse.

horses.name: Tytanis - Horse Armor Vendor STANDALONE
horses.desc: Horse vendor at Whiterun Stables sells horse armor (applied to last horse ridden). This is an optional standalone portion of the Tytanis Mod.

horses.name: Horses walk at double speed and run faster
horses.desc: Makes horses walk 2x faster than vanilla and also run/sprint 75% faster. [Click here](http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/469808-faster-horses/page-13#entry6776938) to create your own custom speed settings.

horses.name: Ridin Dirty
horses.desc: Adds perks that improve mounted combat. Compatible with all horse mods. Only modifes the Light Armor perk tree.

horses.name: Mounted Casting
horses.desc: \[SKSE\] Lets you cast spells while on horseback. Caution: Buggy.

horses.name: About Horses
horses.desc: Replaces the vanilla horse models with a custom mesh and skeleton. Makes horses less fat and taller.

horses.name: Slimmer Horse Shape
horses.desc: Horse is shaped more realistically (changes mesh).

horses.name: Horse Stabling
horses.desc: Your horse will automatically go to the stables (someone will come and escort him there or he will walk there on his own)

horses.name: More Stables
horses.desc: Adds 2 stables with excellent custom voice dialogue - a white horse @ Dragon Bridge & a Dun horse at Ivarstead. (5 horses available in Vanilla)

horses.name: Lesser Hold Stables
horses.desc: Adds 4 stables (Falkreath, Dawnstar, Morthal, and Winterhold). Horses are faster than Vanilla. Cost 1000g.

fast_travel.name: Touring Carriages
fast_travel.desc: Lets you and up to 3 followers travel by carriage **in real time** between the 9 holds. Install or uninstall safely at any time, even while staring at a carriage. (Consider using with [No Predators on roads](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29223))

fast_travel.name: Travel Mounts - for fast travel
fast_travel.desc: Requires you to be mounted on a horse to fast travel

fast_travel.name: Complete Fast Travel Overhaul
fast_travel.desc: A lightweight alternative to [Better Fast Travel - Carriages and Ships](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15508) with a focus on simplicity, stability and compatibility. Use carriages and boats to travel to any settlement with realistic prices based on distance. Restores cut carriage dialogue. Compatible with [Expanded Towns and Cities](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13608/), DLCs, & [Fast travel timescale fix](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19389).

fast_travel.name: Better Fast Travel - Carriages and Ships
fast_travel.desc: Adds carriages to over 2 dozen locations and ships to 3 cities so you can fast travel to every town and village. (more immersive than fast travel). Not compatible with Better Villages or Extended Ivarstead. Includes an optional ESP to disable fast travel altogether.

fast_travel.name: Travelling Caravan Home abode
fast_travel.desc: Fast travel to 15 locations in a horse-led wagon player home with bed, cooking spit, storage, travel map and more. (Try [Gypsy Eyes Caravan](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33219) for a drivable version)

fast_travel.name: Skyrim Wayshrines - Immersive Fast Travel
fast_travel.desc: \[DG + DB\] Adds a network of teleporting shrines around Skyrim. Travel is instant i.e. no time will pass during fast travel.

boats.name: The Grytewake Legend - Quest and moveable ship
boats.desc: Adds a quest with a ship (player home) as the reward. Ship can fast travel to 4 locations.

boats.name: Travel by Boat
boats.desc: An immersive and lore-friendly way to fast travel by boat. Plays an animation of the boat departing.

boats.name: The Okaazah - Player-Owned Ship with Crew & Travel System
boats.desc: Adds a player-owned ship with crew. Use map behind wheel to fast travel between destinations.

boats.name: Gokstad Sailable Ship and Portable Player Home
boats.desc: Lets you sail a viking ship in real-time with animated oars and sails. Attack while sailing. Also use as a player home (choose from 3 interiors)

boats.name: Sailable Ships of Skyrim
boats.desc: \[SKSE\] Adds a pilotable rowboat and longboat in solitude. Includes land collision detection. Drop anchor on longboat to enter the interior. Recruit crew for longboat. Hire carpenters to repair.

boats.name: Realistic Functional Boats
boats.desc: Adds pilotable row boats with a focus on realism. Realistic movement via paddles. Try with "[Untie and Row Boats](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64450/)

boats.name: Script free ship sailing
boats.desc: Adds a pilotable canoe in Riverwood that collides with terrains, tilts depending on the surface and is affected by water currents. Looks good in both 1st and 3rd person view. Summon with a spell. Add followers to canoe using a spell. Store items in canoe inventory. Canoe can take damage and be repaired. Although not based on it, this mod can be viewed as a more current and improved version of [Pilotable Rowboat](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29526) as they both take a similar approach (sees boat as a horse).

boats.name: Pilotable Rowboat
boats.desc: BETA - Adds a pilotable rowboat to Riften docks. No longer supported. Install [Finally Real Boats](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33247) to replace all rowboats with this Pilotable Rowboat. \*\* Author invites anyone to continue development \*\*

boats.name: Driveable Boats!!!
boats.desc: BETA - Adds a pilotable boat. Press "W" to go forward & steer w/ mouse. Sees the boat as armor and uses water-wakling to stay afloat. Can use bow & cast spells while in boat. Compatible with "Fishing in Skyrim".\*\* Author invites anyone to continue development \*\*

carriages.name: Gypsy Eyes Caravan
carriages.desc: ([Watch comparison video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X_TyuxYXcg0)) A drivable player home! Hitch your house and drive it (or command horse to follow you as you walk on foot). When ready to camp, deploy it as a player home complete with popout sides for tons of crafting and living amenities. Compatible with UFO & Convenient Horses. (or try [Travelers Covered Wagon](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56390)

carriages.name: Dragonkiller Cart Reloaded
carriages.desc: ([Watch comparison video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X_TyuxYXcg0)) Adds a drivable cart + storage and camping gear. Hook up your horse to a cart and drive it. Followers can travel in the back. [Read this helpful post](http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/806458-dragonkiller-cart-reloaded/page-57#entry26421099) by Katsula.

followers.name: Vilja in Skyrim
followers.desc: **(Whiterun)** 4000 lines of custom dialogue, detailed backstory and personality, custom quest and possible romance. Disposition system (your actions affect her disposition to you). Spar with her. She can craft, cook, mine and even shop for you. You can be her Follower. Has her own horse.

followers.name: Sofia - The Funny Fully Voiced Follower
followers.desc: **(Whiterun)** Gamespot Follower Of the Year 2014. Extremely high-quality voice acting. Tons of personality. Highly entertaining albeit not always lore-friendly.

followers.name: INIGO
followers.desc: **(Riften)** A fully voiced adventuring companion with thousands of lines of unique dialogue. Insanely high quality voice acting. Well-developed personality and back story. \*\* Can be buggy when using multiple followers.

followers.name: Arissa - The Wandering Rogue
followers.desc: **(Falkreath)** A fully voiced rogue follower with high quality dialogue, personality, a regard system (your actions affect her opinion of you), smart movement and traveling, and more.

followers.name: Cerwiden -SMART Healer- AI Configurable Companion
followers.desc: **(Riverwood)** \[SKSE\] A powerful healer follower with enhanced AI that will heal you and your other followers. Highly configurable. [Click here](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PbP5gVvy_Ok) for an in-depth video review.

followers.name: Rigmor of Bruma
followers.desc: **(Riverwood)** Rigmor is a fully voiced companion with excellent voice acting. Especially rich back story that includes an epic and memorable quest. (Place last in load order until quest is completed).

followers.name: Mirai - the Girl with the Dragon Heart
followers.desc: **(Markarth)** Standalone fully voiced follower with personality. Excellent voice acting!

followers.name: Atvir Dres - The Last Prince of Tear
followers.desc: **(Windhelm)** \*\* Use with [Atvir Dres - updated by AsaRuth](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51915/) \*\* Adds a unique companion with heightened AI, backstory and vibrant personality. More complex interaction with hundreds of lines of fully voiced dialogue. Does not count toward Follower count.

followers.name: Hoth
followers.desc: **(Morthal)** A bounty hunter companion with highly customized armor and personality. Fully voiced. The only companion that dynamically generates radiant quests for the player based on world location.

followers.name: Companion Valfar
followers.desc: **(Throat of the World)** A companion with highly customized armor and a personality by adding a custom voice and backstory.

followers.name: Anduniel - Quest Aware Custom Voiced Follower Companion
followers.desc: **(Riften)** Highly praised voice acting! 2K+ lines of commentary & dialogue. Custom-voiced, quest-aware elven bard follower. Stand-alone appearance. Hunts, magical favors, rides own horse, original songs. Set home, combat style, outfit, chatter pace and more. Detailed backstory, romance, custom wedding.

followers.name: Odvar the Afflicted
followers.desc: **(Whiterun)** Adds a unique companion with excellent voice-acting who is quest-aware and will comment on your quests. Great back story. (an optional file removes special vomit attack)

followers.name: Enhanced Skyrim Followers - Aela the Huntress
followers.desc: Enhanced dialogue, personality and AI. Not counted as a follower. Must complete "Glory of the Dead", the final quest in the Companions questline.

followers.name: Ulath - Custom voiced Follower - Location Aware
followers.desc: **(College of Winterhold)** \[DG\] A custom-voiced, quest-aware Dunmer with healing, perks and powers. Choice of Warlock, Ranger or Swordsman.

followers.name: Slave Pack Riekling Porter
followers.desc: **(Ravenrock)** \[DB\] A Riekling Porter with an oversized Backpack will carry your weights after you do him a favor. Occupies the pet slot.

followers.name: Wolf Follower
followers.desc: **(Riverwood)** \[SKSE\] Adds a wolf puppy as your follower that will grow with age into a Dire Wolf. Every 7 days, wolf increases in size/health/damage. Give custom name. Learns commands over time. Needs to be fed daily (raw meat).

followers.name: Garm the Husky Companion
followers.desc: **(Whiterun Temple of Arkay)** \[DG\] Adds a husky-wolf companion (choose from multiple sizes and styles). Recommend with [Realistic Husky Sounds](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61884).

followers.name: BFF Animal Companions
followers.desc: **(Dunmeth Pass near Morrowind Border)** Adds a dog and/or fox companion with enhanced AI and custom sounds. Configurable mortality, aggression and confidence levels. 30 texture choices.

followers.name: Wolf Master
followers.desc: **(Falder's Tooth NW of Riften)** Kill their Wolf Master and his three caged wolves will become loyal to you.

followers.name: Mercenaries
followers.desc: Hire as many Mercenaries and Mercenary archers as you can afford. They act like followers - guard, trade, etc. Give individual or group commands. Compatible with UFO. Salary and strength of mercenaries is configurable.

followers.name: Mercenary Company
followers.desc: Hire a company of soldiers (weekly salary). Command them to assault a fort, secure a perimeter and more.

followers.name: Mixed Unit Tactics
followers.desc: Create and control follower squads (up to 120 people). Works with UFO, AFT, EFF, etc. Pay salaries, issue tactical commands, more...

follower_enhancements.name: Extensible Follower Framework
follower_enhancements.desc: \[SKSE\] [Watch comparison video](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3k7IHXW4hbo&list=UUtZWnj8vRQqdqhXAz2Gb-AA). Up to 100 followers. Extensive dialog/command system, group commands, set residence, assign combat style

follower_enhancements.name: Amazing Follower Tweaks
follower_enhancements.desc: [Watch comparison video](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3k7IHXW4hbo&list=UUtZWnj8vRQqdqhXAz2Gb-AA).Up to 5 followers. Extensive dialog/command system. Improves AI. Control follower outfits. Contrl combat AI. Remotely command them in combat. Manage level-ups. Pose them. Tell them to make camp. Auto-fencing. Horse riding. Control aggression, courage, morality, more...

follower_enhancements.name: UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul
follower_enhancements.desc: [Watch comparison video](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3k7IHXW4hbo&list=UUtZWnj8vRQqdqhXAz2Gb-AA). \*\* No longer supported ([Read](http://steamcommunity.com/app/72850/discussions/0/523890681422555089/)) \*\* Up to 15 followers. Extensive dialog/command system, group commands, and horses for followers. [Click here](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37990/) for the Dragonborn DLC patch.

follower_enhancements.name: Simple multiple followers
follower_enhancements.desc: \[SKSE\] Allows up to 10 NPC "normal" followers, 10 NPC "special" followers and 10 pets. Adds many useful dialog options, intelligent looting AI, equipment management AI, trap avoidance AI and more.

follower_enhancements.name: Follower Commentary Overhaul
follower_enhancements.desc: Adds over 1,000 lines of dialogue to the 18 vanilla follower voice types.

follower_enhancements.name: Followers as Companions
follower_enhancements.desc: \[SKSE\] Allows your followers to walk beside you instead of behind you. An alternative version now works with multiple followers.

follower_enhancements.name: Better Stealth AI for Followers - No Torch while Sneaking
follower_enhancements.desc: Followers won't rush to attack while player is sneaking (unless being attacked). Followers will unequip torch when player is sneaking. (Compatible with UFO)

follower_enhancements.name: Follower No Weapon Draw
follower_enhancements.desc: Followers will not draw their weapons when you do if not in combat.

follower_enhancements.name: FCC - Followers can Craft
follower_enhancements.desc: \[SKSE\] Allows your followers to craft for you for players who don't want to be the master at every skill. Choose "I need you to do something", direct them to a Workbench| Forge|Enchanter and then choose task. Also consider [NPCs can Craft](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59350/) or [Alternative Crafting System - I dont want to be a blacksmith](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50546/), [Honed Metal -NPC Crafting and Enchanting services-](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51024/) or [Made to Order](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14474).

follower_enhancements.name: Followers Can Relax
follower_enhancements.desc: Adds dialog options to stay & collect ingredients (follower will collect ingredients for 150 secs) or stay and relax (Follower will wander around, sit, eat and/or sleep if a bed is available.) Compatible w/ AFT & UFO.

follower_enhancements.name: Lively Followers
follower_enhancements.desc: Followers will explore the area on their own if you bore them by not moving for a while (not compatible with mods that allow you to recruit multiple followers)

follower_enhancements.name: Follower Trap Safety
follower_enhancements.desc: Followers will not set off traps. compatible with UFO

follower_enhancements.name: Move it Dammit for NPC Companions and Followers
follower_enhancements.desc: Followers will not block your path. They will get out of your way more quickly. Compatible with UFO and AFT

follower_enhancements.name: Non-Hostile Friendly Fire
follower_enhancements.desc: Friends and Allies will no longer become hostile if you attack them

follower_enhancements.name: My Home is Your Home
follower_enhancements.desc: Can give each follower their own home

follower_enhancements.name: Feed The Animals
follower_enhancements.desc: Lets you give craftable treats to dogs. Adds dialog option ("Give treat") and plays a 3rd person animation.

follower_enhancements.name: Wardrobe Manager
follower_enhancements.desc: Followers/spouses will automatically change their outfit based on situation from choices you create. Many user options (MCM menu).

follower_enhancements.name: Respectful Lydia - Willing Burden Carrier
follower_enhancements.desc: Replaces "I am swoooorn to carry your burden" with another quote of hers

follower_enhancements.name: Less Bitchy Lydia
follower_enhancements.desc: Changes Lydia???s "I am sworn to carry your burdens" line to "What do you want me to carry???? (far less bitchy and annoying)

follower_enhancements.name: Multiple Floors Sandboxing
follower_enhancements.desc: Allows NPCs to detect and interact with objects that are upstairs or downstairs.

spouses_children.name: RS Children Overhaul
spouses_children.desc: Overhauls the appearance of children throughout game. ([view available patches](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55668)). Also consider [Rustic Children](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63353/). [Click here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zSyyiP75_n8) for a video comparing all child overhaul mods

spouses_children.name: Prince and The Pauper
spouses_children.desc: Gives a variety of clothing to all children in game (In Vanilla, over half of the children wear the same outfit)

spouses_children.name: Hearthfire Multiple Adoptions
spouses_children.desc: \[HF\] Allows adoption of up to 6 kids instead of just 2. Move your family into suitable custom homes. Gives children a last name.

spouses_children.name: Adopt a Child
spouses_children.desc: Lets you adopt a child from the Honorhall Orphanage in Riften.

spouses_children.name: Make any child your follower
spouses_children.desc: Allows you to make any child as your follower. They can do all things that vanilla followers can do.

spouses_children.name: Spouses Can Live Everywhere
spouses_children.desc: \*\* Not compatible with Hearthfire! ([source](http://steamcommunity.com/app/72850/discussions/0/523890681422555089/))\*\* Assign spouse to any add-on home or location and your spouse will have the same AI-packages and vendor features as in vanilla homes

spouses_children.name: Marriage Mod - To Have & To Hold
spouses_children.desc: \*\* Not compatible with Hearthfire! \*\* Improves wedding ceremony & reception, assign default outfit to spouse, multiple spouses, divorce, more.

spouses_children.name: Marriage Dynamic Outfits - Spouse Redress and Hugging features
spouses_children.desc: Your spouse will hug you once per day and change outfit depending on their circumstance (configurable)

spouses_children.name: A Simple Marriage Mod
spouses_children.desc: Adds a dialog option to divorce your current spouse. Also automatically divorces you if your spouse dies.

spouses_children.name: Bonds of Matrimony - Divorce
spouses_children.desc: Activate a statue at the bottom of a pool to divorce. Death of spouse = automatic divorce (can remarry)

spouses_children.name: GuruSRs DIVORCE
spouses_children.desc: Activate the Shrine in Maras Temple and click Divorce. Spouse will leave home & return to normal AI

spouses_children.name: Anyone as follower or spouse plus divorce option
spouses_children.desc: Run bat commands on NPCs from console - follower.txt, spouse.txt, divorce.txt

npc_enhancements.name: Immersive Citizens - AI Overhaul
npc_enhancements.desc: \[DG + DB\] Significantly improves the AI of friendly NPCs (citizens) to make them behave more like real people. Numerous improvements watch videos - [Video 1](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7EgWWuWJ7pw) | [Video 2](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9VmY3jdO6Kw)

npc_enhancements.name: ASISASIS Improved INI Files
npc_enhancements.desc:
"Enemy AI 2.0" - Opponents are smarter and there are (optionally) more of them!  
\- Increased spawns (customizable spawn levels) including all added mods without any compatibility issues  
\- Smarter enemy AI (customizable). Enemy will react more intelligently and work together as a team  
\- NPC's will know and use spells that they meet the skill requirements for, including missing vanilla spells and spells from other mods  
\- NPC's now have and use potions intelligently (rarity/frequency of potions is customizable)

npc_enhancements.name: Horsemen - Mounted Combat Enhancement
npc_enhancements.desc:
*   [Module 1](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24286/?tab=2&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D24286&pUp=1) - Mounted Combat for Followers and NPCs (ranged and melee). More travelers on Road. Merchants travel on horses w/ bodyguards. Guards patrol on horse. Random encounters w/ hostile riders. Horse charge for NPCs. Improves horse combat AI/tactics.
*   [Module 2](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24286/?tab=2&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D24286&pUp=1) - Player can rotate freely on horse, use different attacks like swing, stabs which deal different dmg, stab/thrust animations for spears, couched Lance charge. Cast any spell from horse.

npc_enhancements.name: NPC Smarter Water AI
npc_enhancements.desc: \[SKSE\] Enemies will fight in shallow water and pursue you across water. Followers will fight in shallow water and pursue enemies across water. Compatible with everything.

npc_enhancements.name: Fight or fly
npc_enhancements.desc: \[SKSE\] Opponents realistically retreat based on his damage and perceived difference in power

npc_enhancements.name: Mercy
npc_enhancements.desc: Enemy PCs will no longer attack you after yelling "Mercy". They will flee and then wander.

npc_enhancements.name: Run For Your Lives
npc_enhancements.desc: 50K+ endorsements. Makes citizens in a village or city run indoors during a dragon attack

npc_enhancements.name: When Vampires Attack
npc_enhancements.desc: \[DG\] Makes citizens in a village or city run indoors during a vampire attack.

npc_enhancements.name: Everyone is Essential
npc_enhancements.desc: (Try [NPCs Protected Redux](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53602/) as a more current alternative...requires all DLCs) These mods set all non essential NPCs as protected to prevent them from being killed by aggressive mods. Includes NPCs from the DLCs. Does not use a BAT file (ESP can be merged)

npc_enhancements.name: No More Redshirts - Make NPCs Essential
npc_enhancements.desc: Run a batch file (one time only) to set all non essential NPCs and Followers as protected to prevent them from being killed by aggressive mods. Comes with another batch file to make them non-essential. No ESP. Easily edit the list.

npc_enhancements.name: Non-Essential Killable Children
npc_enhancements.desc: Children can be killed, pickpocketed and looted. Children use appropriate furniture. Hearthfire version modifies their inventories.

npc_enhancements.name: Guard Dialogue Overhaul
npc_enhancements.desc: Unlocks missing Guard Dialogue. Guards will be more respectful and acknowledge you as the Thane. \*\* Do NOT clean with TES5Edit. ITMs/UDRs are intended by the author for the mod to work correctly. \*\*

npc_enhancements.name: NPC Reactions
npc_enhancements.desc: NPCs will react to your clothing - Stormcloaks react against players wearing Imperial attire (and vice versa), Guildmembers expect faction gear in guildhouses. Strangers will only converse with players in social locations like inns, homes, guildhouses and stores, etc.

npc_enhancements.name: Wearing faction armour causes aggression
npc_enhancements.desc: Wearing faction armor will make opposing factions hostile towards you.

npc_enhancements.name: No NPC Greetings
npc_enhancements.desc: Reduces the distance required between the player and an NPC before theyll start talking to you

npc_enhancements.name: Less Talkative NPCs
npc_enhancements.desc: Reduces the idle chatter and social conversations NPCs have between you and themselves.

npc_enhancements.name: Merchants only reply with Take a Look
npc_enhancements.desc: Replaces "Some may call this junk, me I call them treasures!" with "Take a Look"

npc_enhancements.name: NPCs can Craft
npc_enhancements.desc: \[SKSE\] Blacksmiths will create/temper weapons and armor. Enchanters will enchant/disenchant items. Alchemists will make potions/poisons and tell you what effect an ingredient has. Also consider [Alternative Crafting System - I dont want to be a blacksmith](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50546/) and [Followers can craft](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23690)

npc_enhancements.name: Honed Metal -NPC Crafting and Enchanting services-
npc_enhancements.desc: \[SKSE\] Blacksmiths will craft and temper at your request. Enchanters will enchant and recharge items for you.

npc_enhancements.name: Order My Items
npc_enhancements.desc: \[SKSE\] Lets your order any needed ingots or alchemy ingredients from vendors for a configurable fee. The time to wait before it becomes available is also configurable.

npc_enhancements.name: CM Free Time
npc_enhancements.desc: Turn on/off random quest assignments from NPCs

npc_enhancements.name: Riverwood Trader sells Clothes
npc_enhancements.desc: Riverwood Trader offers clothing

npc_enhancements.name: NPC Bartering
npc_enhancements.desc: Enables a bartering dialogue with most NPCs. (Will not sell current outfit or main weapon) Most NPCs have a very small amount of gold (use [Pocket Money](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48293/) to give NPCs more gold.)

npc_enhancements.name: Request Bard To Take A Break
npc_enhancements.desc: Adds the dialog option "**Can you take a break**" to all bards when they are playing. (Or try [Bards Play Less - Bards Play Only on Request](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29968)). Useful if you play your own instrument or if you prefer to listen to [True Medieval Music](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27425).

npc_enhancements.name: Skyrim Peasant Fashion
npc_enhancements.desc: Adds 25 new varieties of outfits to townspeople. Lore-friendly. Compatible with Body-Slide, UNP, CBBE, etc.

npc_enhancements.name: Improved closefaced helmets
npc_enhancements.desc: Gives closefaced helmets actual eye sockets and gaps so that you can see the characters' eyes and some face features. Each race has its own model so works with beast races.

npc_enhancements.name: Open Faced Guard Helmets
npc_enhancements.desc: Alters the guard and Stormcloak helms so face is 50% more visible (see image)

npc_enhancements.name: Stormcloaks_n_Guards_with_Faces
npc_enhancements.desc: Alters the guard and Stormcloak helms - replaces full-face helsm with open-face helms so face is 100% more visible (see image). [Friendly Guard Helmets](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16886) is a similar mod with a slightly different style of open-faced helmets.

npc_enhancements.name: No Guard Helmets
npc_enhancements.desc: Completely removes the helmet that city guards and most Stormcloak soldiers wear (Makes them invisible. Armor bonus still added).

npc_enhancements.name: Various guard outfits for Every city
npc_enhancements.desc: Guards wear hold-specific armor. Only changes appearance not stats (Changes mesh and texture for guard's cuirass and helmet)

npc_enhancements.name: Lawrens RNG Guards
npc_enhancements.desc: Guards will wear custom-skinned, lore-friendly outfits that are more appropriate to their hold and climate

npc_enhancements.name: Stormcloak Armor Variety
npc_enhancements.desc: Stormcloaks spawn with a variety of different armor

npc_enhancements.name: Imperial Legion Armor Variety
npc_enhancements.desc: Legionnaires spawn with a variety of different armor

npc_enhancements.name: Guards Armor Replacement
npc_enhancements.desc: Replaces guard armor (males only) with open-faced helmets and chainmail hauberks bearing their household's crest. Does not change Stormcloak armors.

npc_enhancements.name: Varied Guards and Stormcloaks
npc_enhancements.desc: Stormcloaks and Imperials wear random helmets & wear more appropriate armor. Not compatible with Hearthfire.

npc_enhancements.name: Lantern Caretakers
npc_enhancements.desc: A NPC will light one of the town's lanterns each night and then go to the nearest Inn (adds immersion). (requires [Lanterns of Skyrim - All in One](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18916))

npc_enhancements.name: Diverse Priests
npc_enhancements.desc: Priests' robes match their faith - priests of Kynareth wear green, priests of Dibella wear red, priests of Arkay wear gray, priests of Talos wear brown and priests of Mara wear tan.

npc_encounters.name: Interesting NPCs
npc_encounters.desc: 50K+ endorsements. Adds over 250 voiced NPCs with over 25K lines of dialogue, over 25 followers with location-based commentary, 15+ marriage NPCs, and over 50 quests.

npc_encounters.name: Immersive Patrols
npc_encounters.desc: Adds lore-friendly patrols - Civil War (Imperials & Stormcloaks), Bandits, Travelers, Werewolves and a DawnGuard plugin. Use as many plugins as you want. Compatible with DawnGuard and WARZONES - Civil Unrest.

npc_encounters.name: WARZONES 2015 - Civil Unrest
npc_encounters.desc: Adds battles, ambushes, encounters and skirmishes between the various factions throughout Skyrim.

npc_encounters.name: Inconsequential NPCs
npc_encounters.desc: Adds over 90 NPCs around Skyrim to enhance social ambiance such as carriage guards, ladies of the evening, skooma dealers, mercenaries, merchants, etc. Some NPCs will visit Inns. Compatible with Interesting NPCs.

npc_encounters.name: OBIS - Organized Bandits In Skyrim
npc_encounters.desc: Replaces vanilla bandits with varied and unique bandits. Over 1000 unique bandits in all. 33 bandit types. Adds named bandits. Adds bandit patrols (optional).

npc_encounters.name: Adventurers and Travelers
npc_encounters.desc: Adds up to 128 NPCs. Player can choose how many of each type to add - up to 54 Adventurers, 64 Travelers, 28 Robbers, 3 Khajiit Adventurers or 6 other Dovahkin.

npc_encounters.name: Prostitutes of Skyrim
npc_encounters.desc: Adds 20 lore-friendly male and female prostitute NPCs. Once paid, prostitute escorts you to a private location, sits and the screen fades to black. (An alternate version shows them undress before fading to black and re-equipping afterwards)

npc_encounters.name: Travellers of Skyrim
npc_encounters.desc: Adds 50 new NPCs (alchemists, apothecaries, mercenaries & merchants) that randomly travel between inns/general goods stores. At each location, they will eat, chat and/or sit around before continuing their journey.

npc_encounters.name: Randomly-Generated Generic Townsfolk
npc_encounters.desc: Intelligently spawns a variety of townspeople to make towns more populated. Lite and Liter version available for 1/2 or 1/3 as many spawn points.

npc_encounters.name: DFB - Random Encounters
npc_encounters.desc: Adds a random encounter generator to spawn up to 28 varieties of creatures (e.g. Bears, Wolves, Dragons, Bandits, Orcs, Trolls, Skeletons, Werewolves, etc). Player can configure which creatures, how many, how difficult and how often. 200 hand-placed spawn points.

npc_encounters.name: SIM - Skyrim npc Immersion Mod
npc_encounters.desc: Adds new NPC adventurers, new random encounters and more.

npc_encounters.name: Sands of Time - Ultimate Deadly Encounters
npc_encounters.desc: \[DG\]\[DB\] Adds random chance of being attacked while sleeping, fast traveling, waiting, or walking beteeen towns. Highly configurable through MCM. [Click here](http://sotrealms.enjin.com/acclaimedmods) for a list of complimentary mods that work well with Sands of Time.

npc_encounters.name: Sands of Time Sleeping Encounters Standalone Module
npc_encounters.desc: A barebones version of Sands of Time (no DLCs required). Adds random chance of being attacked while sleeping. Designate any 6 locations as safe to sleep.

npc_encounters.name: Populated Cities Towns Villages
npc_encounters.desc: Adds 193 new NPCs to 15 locations. No scripts so install or uninstall safely anytime. The race and type of NPC makes sense based on the location with each NPC following their own AI package. Also consider [Populated Lands Roads Paths](http://erkeilmods.altervista.org/skyrim/populated-lands-roads-paths-rs/) by the same author.

npc_encounters.name: LIAT - Lively Inns and Taverns
npc_encounters.desc: Populates inns with more people. Inns are now lively! Includes ambient crowd noises and animations. Use with [(Less) Lively Inns and Taverns](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60619) to reduce the number of NPCs added.

npc_encounters.name: Crowded Solitude
npc_encounters.desc: Adds 30 NPCs to Solitude each with different paths and times that they travel.

wildlife_enhancements.name: SkyTEST - Realistic Animals and Predators
wildlife_enhancements.desc: Animal AI overhaul - complete food chain (hunt, drink water, forage), mating, hibernation, babies, proper inter-faction reactions, fight or flight, more (90% compatible with Real Wild Life)

wildlife_enhancements.name: Real Wildlife - Skyrim
wildlife_enhancements.desc: \*\* Also install the patch [Real Wildlife - deutsch - verbessert](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31925/) \*\* Edits leveled lists to add animals with a variety of age and diseases, Revised AI and wildlife faction interaction, adjusted speeds, 16 new diseases, 45 new ingredients, 21 new foods & 21 new recipes. [Not compatible with Hearthfire](http://forums.steampowered.com/forums/showthread.php?t=2963860) unless [this patch](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31925/) is also installed.

wildlife_enhancements.name: One With Nature - Dynamic Animals and Creatures
wildlife_enhancements.desc: Let's you individually set the passive or aggressive level of many animals/creatures using the MCM menu.

wildlife_enhancements.name: Peaceful Mudcrabs
wildlife_enhancements.desc: Regular mudcrabs wont attack you. The bigger ones will still attack
