wildlife_enhancements.name: Friendly Creatures
wildlife_enhancements.desc: Makes bears, wolves, skeevers, mudcrabs, slaughterfish and horkers non-aggressive. They will only attack if you get too close to them. (or try [Pacifist mini-Mods](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21183) as an alternative)

wildlife_enhancements.name: No Predators on roads
wildlife_enhancements.desc: Relocates predator wildlife from roads to wilderness (prey and ambient creatures untouched). Less disruptions when traveling by cart or horse between cities.

wildlife_enhancements.name: Bigger Badder Bears
wildlife_enhancements.desc: Increases the size, weight and damages of bears. Several versions available. (Use "[Bigger Bears](http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=12923)" to only increase the size)

wildlife_enhancements.name: Faster Woodland Creatures
wildlife_enhancements.desc: Increases speed of some animals, increases value of some pelts. No change to AI or animals stats (difficulty)

wildlife_enhancements.name: Realistic Wildlife (Loot And Recipes)
wildlife_enhancements.desc: More realistic animal loot - MUCH more meat and no more gold + new cooking recipes. Compatible with [Realistic Needs and Diseases](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26228/)

wildlife_enhancements.name: ClamsDropPearls
wildlife_enhancements.desc: Clams might have a pearl: Lg Clams - 10% (lg pearl), Normal Clams - 20%, Thin Clams - 30% chance (sm pearl)

wildlife_encounters.name: Birds of Skyrim
wildlife_encounters.desc: Adds 20 varieties of (non-flying) birds e.g. chickens, roosters, pigeons, pheasants, etc. (Compatible with skyBirds & Birds & Flocks). Recommend [Ruhadre's patch](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72833/)

wildlife_encounters.name: skyBirds - Airborne Perching Birds
wildlife_encounters.desc: \*\* CORRECTION (June 2016): Does NOT cause save bloat. [read more](https://m.reddit.com/r/skyrimmods/comments/4mcvxz/skybirds_new_testing_being_done/) \*\* Adds realistic birds that chirp, sing, eat insects, build nests, can land or perch anywhere, and fly away when you approach. (Compatible with Birds of Skyrim & fixes issues with Birds & Flocks). Consider [this patch](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76065/) to improve performance in cities.

wildlife_encounters.name: Birds and Flocks
wildlife_encounters.desc: \*\* (June 2016) per Nazenn - Use [the fan made version](https://www.dropbox.com/s/ex9oakmi5cuxosk/Birds-USLEEPHearthfireClean.zip) instead. It makes the mod Hearthfire compatible and also cleans out most of the wild edits and all the major ones [Read More](http://steamcommunity.com/app/72850/discussions/0/523890681422555089/?ctp=42)\*\* Adds dozens more instances of birds that fly away when startled. (Compatible with skyBirds & Birds of Skyrim)

wildlife_encounters.name: 101Bugs
wildlife_encounters.desc: Adds bugs, butterflies, dragonflies, Luna-moths & torchbugs for added immersion

wildlife_encounters.name: Animallica - Skyrim Wildlife Overhaul
wildlife_encounters.desc: Adds over 100 new animal species such as bears, moose, deer, goats, antelopes, pheasants, rabbits, raccoons, badgers, beavers, wolves, and more. Recommend lore-friendly version - requires no DLC and removes tropical and savannah animals. Compatible with SkyTEST, Hunterborn and Real Wildlife.

wildlife_encounters.name: Pets of Skyrim
wildlife_encounters.desc: Adds cats, dogs, rabbits, and a wolf puppy to Tamriel. If prompted, many will become your companion.

wildlife_encounters.name: Dogs of Skyrim
wildlife_encounters.desc: \[DG\] Makes Vanilla dogs unique (different breeds and colors). Adds 80 new instances of dogs including guard dogs, pub dogs, NPC companion dogs/puppies and adoptable strays.

wildlife_encounters.name: More Village Animals
wildlife_encounters.desc: Adds more farm animals to 11 farms

wildlife_encounters.name: Real Animals: Domesticated
wildlife_encounters.desc: Adds 14+ varieties of farm animals to 14+ locations

wildlife_encounters.name: Horses Gone Wild
wildlife_encounters.desc: Adds herds of wild horses to various locations. 1 stallion in each herd is ridable.

wildlife_encounters.name: Wild Horses
wildlife_encounters.desc: Adds herds of wild horses around Skyrim (stallions, mares, colts, fillies and geldings). Easy to find a ridable horse.

wildlife_encounters.name: Cliffracers
wildlife_encounters.desc: Adds a few cliffracers near the Morrowind border. They can be shot down but they dont attack (watch video)

wildlife_encounters.name: Improved Fish
wildlife_encounters.desc: Adds 33 variants of pond fish, 18 bigger fish & and a stringray. (Dragonflies spawn above pond fish spawn points). Adds a filleting bench to fillet fish. ([Click here](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29620) for Realistic Needs and Diseases compatibility patch)

creatures.name: Skyrim Immersive Creatures
creatures.desc: \[DG\] Adds over 2K creature variants (with lore-friendliness options). Adds skeleton resurrection - random chance to come back to life at a random time. Adds new radiant quests, new bosses and more.

creatures.name: Monster Mod
creatures.desc: Adds hundreds of new creatures. Spawn at appropriate locations. Added to leveled lists.

creatures.name: Skyrim Monster Mod Lore-Friendlier Replacer
creatures.desc: Modifies Skyrim Monster Mod so only lore-friendly monsters are added

creatures.name: Here There Be Monsters
creatures.desc: Adds six massive mystical monsters that prowl the Ghost sea. Adds 3 ship captains that can be hired, 3 survivors in the docks, and an expert monster hunter for hire.

creatures.name: Automatic Variants
creatures.desc: Applies a variety of textures to the same creature type e.g. all wolves in a pack will have different colors. Numerous AV packages listed on mod's description page.

creatures.name: Truly Undead - Reborn
creatures.desc: Lets you configure the chance of resurrection, health bonus, and/or what is required to kill skeletons, vampires, draugr and dragon priests

creatures.name: Syynxs Stubborn Skeletons
creatures.desc: \*\* Caution \*\* Skeletons have more health, do 50% more dmg and have a high chance of getting back up again when killed. (skeleton resurrection is included in [Immersive Creatures](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24913))

creatures.name: Armored Skeletons and The Walking Dead
creatures.desc: Adds several new Skeleton & Undead types wearing iron, steel or leather armor. Stronger than vanilla skeletons. (included in [Immersive Creatures](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24913))

creatures.name: Beast Skeletons
creatures.desc: Adds Orc, Khajit and Argonian skeletons to several locations. Adds a spell to conjure a skeleton reflecting your own race. (included in [Immersive Creatures](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24913))

creatures.name: JAWS - Deadly Oceans
creatures.desc: Adds 8 deadly species of slaughterfish ("jawfish") to northern coast (up to 10X bigger). Adds custom sounds and music (configurable). [Read testimonial](http://i.imgur.com/OHgmD.png).

creatures.name: SkyTEST - Harder Creatures
creatures.desc: Harder trolls, vampires, giants, skeletons, werewolves, SprigganMatrons, FrostBite Spiders, Attronachs, Dremora, Chaurus Reaper & Dwarven Centurions.

creatures.name: Dangerous Wolves
creatures.desc: Wolves do 3X more dmg (15 from 5) and have 2X more Health (24 from 12)

dragons.name: Deadly Dragons
dragons.desc: \[SKSE\] \[DG\] 50K+ endorsements. Adds new dragons. + lets you customize dragon health, armor, melee damage, breath damage, and event system frequency. Set to vanilla by default.

dragons.name: Dragons Diversified
dragons.desc: Works with Deadly Dragons. Replaces the standard dragons with 13 new dragon breeds, each heavily scripted to provide more interesting gameplay.

dragons.name: Enhanced Mighty Dragons
dragons.desc: Replaces vanilla dragons with 16 dragons having unique resistances, weaknesses and shouts. Each dragon has their own age, names, stats, tactics and textures. Choose between 8 difficulty levels.

dragons.name: Resilient Dragons
dragons.desc: NPCs deal less damage to all Dragons, as well as increasing the Dragon core health and mitigation.

dragons.name: Dragon Combat Overhaul
dragons.desc: An overhaul of the dragon's combat AI to create more random and realistic behavior in combat.

dragons.name: SKREEE - Less Frequent Dragons
dragons.desc: Reduces # of random dragon spawns (50% or 75% chance spawn is canceled - player choice) Compatible with all deadlier dragon mods. (Ignore reports that this mod is broken. It works just fine - Aug 2015)

dragons.name: Immediate Dragons
dragons.desc: No longer need to see the good old Greybeards for dragons to spawn officially. works great with alternate starts and existing characters

dragons.name: Passive dragon encounters
dragons.desc: Dragons encountered won't be aggressive to player unless attacked. They'll still attack towns and guards will still attack dragons. (optional file makes them passive to everyone unless attacked)

dragons.name: Dragon Remains
dragons.desc: Prevents dragons from becoming a skeleton when they die (you still get the dragon soul)

dragons.name: Bellyaches New Dragon Species
dragons.desc: Adds 13 new, non-replacing dragon species into the world.

dragons.name: Dovahkriid - The Dragon Lords
dragons.desc: Adds 10 extremely powerful named dragons. Their scales can be used to craft special armor.

dragons.name: Baby Dragons of Skyrim
dragons.desc: Adds baby dragons to Skyrim and adds parent, child and sibling relations to the new Dragons.(does not conflict with other dragon mods)

dragons.name: Dragon Nests
dragons.desc: Adds dragon nests, young dragons and dragonlings (can't shout or fly). Female dragons more aggressive when near dragonlings.

dragons.name: Burning Skies - Flyable Dragon Races 3
dragons.desc: (or try [Flying Mod](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15775/) plus [Animated Dragon Wings](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53271/)) Adds a shout that lets you transform into a dragon and fly

thievery_overhaul.name: Stealth Skills Rebalanced - Sneak - Lockpicking - Pickpocket
thievery_overhaul.desc: A modular rebalance (i.e. more challenging) of Sneak, Lockpicking, and Pickpocket skills, settings, enchantments and perks. Sound, light, armor worn, and speed play a greater role in sneak detection. Item weight more important when pickpocketing. Lockpick sweet spot reduced. Gauntlets affect lockpicking. Stronger lockpicks. NPCs search longer if attacked. Crime report radius reduced. More.

stealth.name: Sneak Tools
stealth.desc: \[SKSE\] Adds ability to knockout target (sneak attack w/ empty hands), slit throat (sneak attack w/ dagger) or kill a sleeping NPC. Adds a cowl that can mask your identity, water arrows and rope arrows.

stealth.name: Immersive Detection of NPCs
stealth.desc: Improves when NPCs can detect you based on sight and sound. Considers light sources, time of day, interior vs exterior and weather as factors.

stealth.name: Path of Shadows
stealth.desc: Realistic stealth - Adjusts detection time. Light, armor and movement matter

stealth.name: Shadow Play - Sneak and Stealth Rebalance Mod
stealth.desc: Sneaking much harder, light more important, NPCs look longer, armor more important

stealth.name: SkyRealism - Stealth and Sneak Detection Durations
stealth.desc: Changes alarm durations - hearing or detecting movement of an enemy = 30 secs (was 10), seeing an enemy = 120 secs (was 10), being attacked by an enemy = 180 secs (was 15), after losing an enemy = 60 secs (was 10)

stealth.name: Improved sneak detection
stealth.desc: improves Skyrim's detection while sneaking, triggered by loud noises, changes in light sources and movement.

stealth.name: Binocular Vision For NPCs while Sneaking
stealth.desc: Changes Vanillas 190 Degree detection radius to 135 Degrees (see image)

stealth.name: Sneak Tweak
stealth.desc: Increases reset time after detection or being attacked. View cone is narrower but enemies detect your more easily in a lighted area. NPCs detect noise better.

stealth.name: Armor Disguises
stealth.desc: Wear ALL pieces of a Factions armor to be disguised as a member (i.e. all fur = bandit disguise)

stealth.name: Professional Shiv
stealth.desc: Roleplay enhancement - adds an assassin's shiv that does 1 pt of dmg but will kill the target instantly if used successfully while in stealth mode. (Recommend "[The Dance of Death - A Killmove Mod](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10906)")

stealth.name: Shortcuts - Secret Entrances For All Cities Plus Thieves Guild
stealth.desc: Adds secret entrances into and out of the major cities

stealth.name: Shenk Thievery Overhaul
stealth.desc: \*\* No updates since Mar 2012 \*\* Adds city stealthways, shop guards, guard dogs, specialty arrows, more loot in buildings + dozens of fixes & other improvements

pickpocket.name: Simple Pickpocket Rebalance
pickpocket.desc: Doubles weight multiplier for pickpocket difficulty (stealing heavier stuff is harder)

lockpicking.name: Lock Overhaul
lockpicking.desc: Lets you auto lockpick (at the cost of lockpicks), smash locks or open locks with a spell.

lockpicking.name: SEU - Skyrim Enhanced Unlocking - ENGLISH
lockpicking.desc: Unlock by weapon, spell, acid or fus ro dah (doors only). Bash works with [SkyRe](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9286). (This is the updated SKSE version of [GBU - Gerauld s Better Unlocking](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18642))

lockpicking.name: Lockpick graduation by Lilyu
lockpicking.desc: Adds markings to lock textures on chests. Provides a visual reference point on where your lockpick broke.

lockpicking.name: Randomized Lockpicking
lockpicking.desc: Replaces the lockpicking minigame with a random chance based on your lockpicking skill and the lock's level.

lockpicking.name: Auto Lock Picking
lockpicking.desc: Automatically unlock the doors and chest. Unlocking probability will vary with the difficulty of the lock and the perk.

lockpicking.name: less touchy lockpicking
lockpicking.desc: Easier - Increases the sweet spot on higher lvl locks without making lower level locks too easy (see image)

lockpicking.name: Fluffkins Immersive Lock Picking Mod
lockpicking.desc: Harder - all sweet spots are smaller, picks last longer, less difference between lock types,

lockpicking.name: Harder lockpicking
lockpicking.desc: Much harder - can open novice locks and MAYBE apprentice locks but will need skills to open adept+ locks

lockpicking.name: More Locked Containers
lockpicking.desc: Higher chance of locked chest, chance of increased loot if locked

lockpicking.name: Less Lockpicks
lockpicking.desc: Reduces number of lockpicks found in loot

crime.name: Reneers Crime Overhaul
crime.desc: Modifies how Guards react to player crimes. \*\* Mod contains several bugs. No longer supported. ([source](http://steamcommunity.com/app/72850/discussions/0/523890681422555089/)) \*\*

crime.name: Realistic Crime Radius
crime.desc: Reduces the crime report radius from 4000 (feet possibly?) down to 350

crime.name: Crime Bounty Decay
crime.desc: Crimes will slowly be forgotten when spending time in other holds. Each night, your bounty will decrease (configurable amount) in every hold as long as you're not actually in the main settlement of that hold at the time.

crime.name: Longer Jailtime
crime.desc: Increases the maximum jailtime from 7 days to 30, 60 or 100 days

crime.name: Expanded Jail Cells
crime.desc: Need food and drink while in jail. (Recommend RTR - Realtime Reading)

crime.name: Life in Prison
crime.desc: Allow you to roleplay your time in prison

crime.name: Higher Bounties for Crimes
crime.desc: Higher bounties for crimes. Click [here](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/ccc?key=0AgLGgOD1havrdGxjc3JkZDFGZm10bjVRYkZtdXU1Ymc#gid=0) to see adjusted bounties. Amt of fine varies by hold (and affects jailtime in Crime & Punishment)

crime.name: Dont Commit Crimes
crime.desc: Higher bounties for crimes. Click [here](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/ccc?key=0AgLGgOD1havrdGxjc3JkZDFGZm10bjVRYkZtdXU1Ymc#gid=0) to see adjusted bounties

crime.name: Vinis Crime Gold - More Expensive Bounty
crime.desc: Higher bounties for crimes. Click [here](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/ccc?key=0AgLGgOD1havrdGxjc3JkZDFGZm10bjVRYkZtdXU1Ymc#gid=0) to see adjusted bounties

crafting_overhaul.name: Complete Crafting Overhaul Remade
crafting_overhaul.desc: A remake of Headbomb's original [Complete Crafting Overhaul](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8003) Adds missing weapon and armor upgrade recipes, fixes crafting recipes (more logical), can only craft armor from own faction, recipe filtering, smelting and mining enhancements and much more. Highly compatible with many mods. Highly customizable through MCM. Support for all DLCs.

crafting_overhaul.name: Smithing Perks Overhaul - Remade and Updated
crafting_overhaul.desc: A remake of Headbomb's original [Smithing Perks Overhaul](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6047/). Allows all weapons & armor in Skyrim to be improved further based on one perk or another. Requires [Weapons and Armor Fixes - Remade](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34093)

crafting_overhaul.name: Ars Metallica - Smithing Enhancement
crafting_overhaul.desc: Adds ability to forge arrows, lockpicks, skill advancement for using smelter and tanning rack, melting down armor and clutter, craft guild-appropriate gear and more. (DLC Add-ons available)

crafting_overhaul.name: Lost Art of the Blacksmith
crafting_overhaul.desc: Adds missing weapon and armor upgrade recipes. Recommended to use with Smithing Perks Overhaul and Weapon and Armor Fixes. Not compatible with Complete Crafting Overhaul. \*\* Be sure to install [Sharlikran's Compatibility Patch](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26230), too \*\*

crafting_overhaul.name: More Craftables
crafting_overhaul.desc: Adds variety of craftable weapon and armor

crafting_overhaul.name: WARR - Weapon and Armor Recipes Rebalanced
crafting_overhaul.desc: Revises armor and weapon crafting recipes to make them more realistic and challenging (e.g. wood needed to craft shields and weapons with wooden shafts). In general, recipes require more resources in both quantity and variety.

crafting_overhaul.name: -JK- Crafting Breakdown -Junk Melting Smelting-
crafting_overhaul.desc: A complete recreation of Vals Crafting Meltdown from scratch by jediakyrol. 90% the same.

crafting_overhaul.name: Vals Crafting Meltdown Alpha - Melting Smelting and Fletchin
crafting_overhaul.desc: \*\* Use [Sharlikran's Compatibility Patch](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26230) instead! (original mod not required)\*\* Adds ability to melt down armor, weapons and misc items back into raw materials, smelt gold/silver rings & amulets, and fletch arrows. Designed to work with Lost Art of the Blacksmith + More Craftables

crafting_overhaul.name: Melt Down Everything
crafting_overhaul.desc: \[SKSE\] Gives you the ability to melt down every piece of metallic ammo, armor and weapons, even if they are from mods.

crafting_overhaul.name: Crafting 300 - Armoury of Tamriel
crafting_overhaul.desc: A weapons and smithing overhaul - Makes weapon material separate from style. Learn materials via perks, learn styles via smithing books. Improve weapons with gem dust. Dragon-Rune Crafting. New Smithing Perk Tree.

crafting_overhaul.name: Arrowsmith
crafting_overhaul.desc: Lets you craft arrows in bundles of 50. Must have relevant smithing perk. (Click [here](http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=86946847) for Dawnguard version)

crafting_overhaul.name: JBSchroeds Complete Mundane Overhaul
crafting_overhaul.desc: Adds missing weapon and armor improvement recipes. Realistic reweight of all items. Faction armor requires book, can break down weapons/armor >> scrap >> ingots. Recommended to use with Smithing Perks Overhaul and Weapon and Armor Fixes

crafting.name: Alternative Crafting System - I dont want to be a blacksmith
crafting.desc: \[SKSE\] Request armor and weapons to be made/repaired for you by any blacksmith. The more skillful the blacksmith, the more expensive (customizable). Crafting takes time (customizable). Also consider [NPCs can Craft](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59350/), [Followers can craft](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23690), [Honed Metal -NPC Crafting and Enchanting services-](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51024/) or [Made to Order](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14474)

crafting.name: SkyRealism - Portable Crafting Kits
crafting.desc: \[SKSE\] Adds portable kits that can be crafted for mobile Alchemy, Cooking, Enchanting, Forging, Sharpening, Smelting, Tanning and Tempering

crafting.name: Expanded Jewelry Crafting
crafting.desc: Expands the jewelry crafting to include Dwarven, Orcish, Elven, Glass, Ebony, Daedric and Dragonbone jewelery. Use [this mod](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30393) to add to leveled lists.

crafting.name: Tailoring
crafting.desc: Adds a tailoring workshop. Create cloths and dyes and craft clothing at a loom.

crafting.name: Map Tomes and Writing Table
crafting.desc: Adds a writing table that lets you craft books containing your completed collection of maps and recipes (treasure maps, basic potion recipes, resist potion recipes and poison recipes)

crafting.name: Lorecraft - learning and managing for crafting - CORE
crafting.desc: Buy crafting books from merchants to learn crafting recipes. Can only craft what youve learned to craft. Use book to turn off recipes to remove them from crafting list.

crafting.name: Real-Time Smithing
crafting.desc: \[SKSE\] Placing your weapon on a workbench and beating it with a blacksmith hammer (in real-time) improves it temporarily.

crafting.name: Long Lost Smelters of Skyrim
crafting.desc: Puts a smelter in the big cities that didn't get one in vanilla, and some of the hamlets, including Riverwood.

crafting.name: Smithing Perks Reworked
crafting.desc: Smithing Perks no longer give you the ability to create armors and weapons, only improve them. Find and smelt down a full set of related armor and then you can craft it. (Same for weapons)

cooking.name: Filled Pots
cooking.desc: Adds vegetables, meats, soups or stews to the empty pots hanging over fires around Skyrim.

cooking.name: Babettes Feast - Improved Cooking
cooking.desc: Adds milk and 11 new food recipes + unique models. 3 versions of food effects. Compatible with [Realistic Needs and Diseases](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26228/). \*\* Be sure to install [Sharlikran's Compatibility Patch](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26230), too \*\*

cooking.name: Cooking Expanded
cooking.desc: Adds 14 new food recipes. [Click here](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28591) to make compatible with [Realistic Needs and Diseases](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26228/).

cooking.name: Gromits Cooking Recipes - Food - Drink Overhaul
cooking.desc: 51 cooking recipes - food & drinks affect health, magicka & stamina regen rates (no compatibility mods)

cooking.name: Be a Milk Drinker
cooking.desc: Adds milk, apple juice, carrot juice, grape juice, juniper berry juice, snowberry juice and tomato juice as drink options.

cooking.name: Better Bee Hive - Get That Honey and Brew Alcohol
cooking.desc: Makes honey and honeycombs less rare and adds new recipes using honey and honeycombs in cooking, drinking, and alchemy.

cooking.name: No Salt for Meat Recipes
cooking.desc: Salt is no longer needed to cook meat (because cooking deer at campfire should not require salt). Salt still needed for stews and other recipes.

cooking.name: More Salt Please
cooking.desc: Food vendors will now have 3-7 salt for sale instead of 1 (except produce vendors).

cooking.name: Salt Sack
cooking.desc: Adds salt sacks next to most cooking areas (about 155 in all)

alchemy.name: Alchemy Requires Bottles
alchemy.desc: An empty bottle is required to craft each potion (solves spamming). Makes time pass when crafting potions (time needed decreases with skill) \*Not compatible with Realistic Needs and Diseases.

alchemy.name: Learn Alchemy From Recipes
alchemy.desc: Learn ingredients effects by reading alchemy recipes

alchemy.name: Alchemical Apparati
alchemy.desc: Adds an alembic which can be used to make potions and poisons on the go. (Equip the alembic to prompt the alchemy interface). (alternative: [SkyRealism - Portable Crafting Kits](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21866))

alchemy.name: Phitts Alchemy and Food Overhaul
alchemy.desc: Rebalances and enhances the alchemy and food crafting systems

alchemy.name: Alchemy Overhaul
alchemy.desc: ([Click here](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36389/) for more current version) Realistic chemistry - create realistic chemical compounds from natural ingredients using extractor and diffusor and then combine compounds to create potions and poisons.

alchemy.name: GUISE - Vile Concoctions
alchemy.desc: Extensive optional enhancements to alchemy making it viable to roleplay as an Alchemist character. Adds new perks that enable creating new weapons such as chemical grenades and mines, poisons, arrows, etc. Adds an optional and configurable toxicity/overdose system (using too many potions yields penalties), potion cooldown and much more. Watch video. Included as one part of several other game enhancements (MCM-configurable.

alchemy.name: Useful Potions
alchemy.desc: Effectively fixes potion hoarding and potion spamming - Extends potion duration to 5 minutes. Adds toxicity to potions - Players and NPCs have a potion tolerance of 1 potion per 50 base magicka. Exceeding the tolerance level incurs penalties. Everyone's Health, Magicka and Stamina regenerate much slower (configurable rates). Potions will spoil after 7 days. More...

alchemy.name: Immersive Potions
alchemy.desc: \[DG+HF+DB\] Potion effects will take 5 seconds instead of being instant. Effects to not stack i.e. the 2nd potion overwrites the 1st (prevents spamming). Recommend with [Potions Animated](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28114).

alchemy.name: Hardcore Restore Potions
alchemy.desc: Potion effects will take 25 seconds instead of being instant. Recommend with [Potions Animated](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28114).

alchemy.name: Gromits Potions Heal Over Time Mod
alchemy.desc: Potion effects will take 3 seconds instead of being instant. Adjusts weight of all potions to a range of 0.1 to 0.8 based on size of bottle. Recommend with [Potions Animated](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28114).

alchemy.name: Better Stronger and More Effective - Deadly Poisons
alchemy.desc: Increases effectiveness of poisons. Poisons last 5 - 15 seconds. Also applies to poisons created with alchemy and the bite and spit of spiders, Spriggans and Chaurus.

alchemy.name: Syynxs Improved Poisons - Longer poison duration
alchemy.desc: Extends duration of poison effects to 3-10 minutes. Applies to NPC poisons, poison ingredients (e.g. eating a deathbell will poison you for a few minutes), dungeon trap poisons, etc.

alchemy.name: Improved Recipes
alchemy.desc: Allows player to learn the properties of ingredients that are listed in recipes upon reading them.

alchemy.name: Alchemists Have Ingredients
alchemy.desc: Insures that Alchemy shops will stock all potion ingredients. Will have the following amounts: Rare 5, Uncommon 10, Common 15 (optional plugins with higher quantities are available)

alchemy.name: Alchemy Extended
alchemy.desc: Allows more rare ingredients to be sold by vendors and found in the world

alchemy.name: The Great Book of Alchemy -Now in 4 volumes
alchemy.desc: 4 alchemy reference volumes - healing and restoration, poisons, fortifications, alteration and resistances. No pictures. Can only be obtained by console command

alchemy.name: The Big Book of Alchemy v2
alchemy.desc: Lets you find (rare) or buy 3 books (Miscellaneous, Regenerative, and Damaging) containing all potion recipes as written by an old Bosmer. Immersive and lore-friendly.

alchemy.name: Master Alchemy Recipes
alchemy.desc: Adds a book to Alchemist's shack with a handful of powerful potion recipes

alchemy.name: Potions/Poisons Guide
alchemy.desc: Adds a book to BreezeHome with the recipes for all of the potions and poisons

alchemy.name: Useful Books
alchemy.desc: Add 2 books to merchant lists: "Alchemists Desk Reference" - skyrim ingredients + "The Masks of Power" - describes the locations of the Dragon Priest Masks

scrollcrafting.name: The Scribes Lectern
scrollcrafting.desc: Craft magic books from blank book + scroll (can give to follower to learn)

scrollcrafting.name: Scrollcraft
scrollcrafting.desc: Requires 1 roll of paper & Silverdust (can buy or smelt from silver ore or ingots). Craft scrolls at scroll crafting station (added to 5 major holds). Adds rolls of paper & silverdust to Alchemists, Mages & Trade Caravans

scrollcrafting.name: Craftable Scrolls
scrollcrafting.desc: Requires charcoal + parchment + soul gem. Make charcoal at smelter, make parchment at tanning rack, make scrolls at tanning rack. (Click [here](http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2970) for a very similar mod on the Nexus)

enchantments.name: Wintermyst - Enchantments of Skyrim
enchantments.desc: Adds over 100 new enchantments to the game. Adds 1000's of new enchanted items to loot lists and inventories.

enchantments.name: Enchanted Arsenal
enchantments.desc: Create custom visual effects for your enchantments by mixing and matching the animated effects of popular effect mods

enchantments.name: Enchantment Effect Replacer
enchantments.desc: Replaces texture on enchanted weapons (Improves, changes or removes enchantment effect)

enchantments.name: EzEs -Artifact Disenchanting-
enchantments.desc: Lets you disenchant powerful artifacts to learn their affects allowing you to place artifact enchantements on normal weapons.
